name: 158CM CONCEPT STORE
desc: Get everything streetwear at 158CM Concept Store! This style forward clothing store offers an eclectic mix of local and international streetwear brands, allowing you to dress your best wherever you roam. Discover the latest brand collaborations and the hottest street style trends right here.

name: 4Fingers Crispy Chicken
desc: IF you've been looking for food choices that are tasty and wholesome, from a brand that's honest. Then 4FINGERS is here to take over. We're all about giving you great food. And we guarantee that once you've tasted our handbrushed crispy chicken, you'll be wondering how you could have gone for so long without it. Come by and succumb to 4FINGERS Crispy Chicken.

name: Bar.B.Q Plaza
desc: Bar B Q Plaza is best known for its unique, Mongolian-Japanese barbecue style. A memorable dining experience, you can enjoy a barbecue and steamboat meal all at once! The menu is well catered to individual meals or big family platters. However, the Thai brand has added a spin by introducing tangy dipping sauces that are insanely addictive. You will have to try this at least once to know what the hype is all about!

name: De Figurelab
desc: Step into a playful realm of figurine collectibles! The world of DE FIGURELAB is diverse with an endlessly creative collection of art toys and figurines. Feast your eyes on iconic classics, one-of-a-kind creations, and limited-edition designer collaborations, then bring them home to start or expand your very own collection. This figurine store is a treasure trove of art toys waiting to be explored!

name: Fun X Factory
desc: Spice up your adult life with something fun from FUN X FACTORY! This novelty store has over 2000 product reviews to help you choose the right toy for your needs. Whether you are looking for something for yourself or for you and your partner, you might just find it here. Visit the store to explore your options and leave feeling thrilled about what’s to come.

name: Glow House
desc: Revel in the hair pampering sessions of your dreams at Glowhouse! This is not your ordinary salon – it's dedicated to washes, blowouts, and styling that will have you feeling gorgeous and empowered. Turn your hair goals into reality! Step right in, take a seat, and experience top-notch hair services. Strut out of the salon feeling like an absolute boss babe.

name: Golden Screen Cinemas
desc: Power through blockbuster after blockbuster at Golden Screen Cinemas! This multiplex is currently the biggest in Johor Bahru and the second largest in Malaysia, boasting 18 halls equipped with plush seating, multi-dimensional Dolby Atmos® audio surround technology, 4DX, and much more! If that’s not enough, go lux with private halls. The latest international and local screenings will come into life before your eyes every single time, so just sit tight and enjoy the movie!

name: HEYTEA
desc: Real premium teas, bold authentic flavours! HEYTEA serves handcrafted tea beverages of the finest quality made with real ingredients. From a humble store in a small alley in Jiangbianli, HEYTEA has grown its empire of tea beverages made with fresh milk and fruits, premium teas, and natural cane sugar, infusing new life into traditional teas. If you’re not already a fan, try its best-selling Cheese Grape Boom or Supreme Brown Sugar Bobo Milk, and find out why so many love it!

name: Ichiban Ramen
desc: Japanese ramen specialist that brings authentic Japanese cuisine to everyone at affordable pricing in delightfully cozy environment. From a single shop, Ichiban Ramen has grown into a household name for quality Japanese food with branches all over Malaysia. With materials sourced directly from Japan for a wide variety of delicious dishes, it’s the place of choice for great Japanese food!

name: Jigsaw Puzzle World
desc: The jigsaw enthusiast could while away hours in this store, and with the wide range of designs in 2D and 3D, glow in the dark, and more, we can definitely see why!

name: Johor Bahru Blood Donation Suite
desc: Your blood can help to save a life. You can now donate blood to those in need at Pusat Darah Negara (PDN), a blood transfusion service centre established under the Ministry of Health. PDN collects blood and blood component production and supplies them to general as well as private hospitals. Donate blood and make a difference today.

name: Ke Ren Lai
desc: Previously known as Guest Restaurant, KeRenLai is a well established Hakka restaurant. Regular customers come back for the authentic flavours and the fresh ingredients used to prepare each dish. If you’re looking for a new restaurant to treat your family to, KeRenLai provides you a comfortable atmosphere and delicious food.

name: KF Kiddy Circuit
desc: Let your young racers “Feel-The-Rush” in the first one-of-a-kind indoor go-kart circuit, KF Kiddy Circuit! Perfect place for family outing, KF Kiddy Circuit karts are safely designed for young ones to enjoy the adrenaline of racing, with precaution measures such as safety belt, water-filled track barriers, speed and height limit being placed. They will also be able to learn the basics of driving while being behind the wheel of these electric kids kart.

name: Kiddytopia
desc: Enter a world of fun and games at Kiddytopia, a family-friendly play park kids are sure to love. The wide open space is filled with toys, play equipment and attractions for kids and adults to discover. Friendly staff are always on hand to provide assistance, oversee safety regulations and provide a clean environment throughout the experience. It’s a great place to be when you need some quality family time affordably!

name: Klinik Mediviron
desc: A reputable name in medicine, Klinik Mediviron is a go-to clinic for many due to its accessibility. There are 179 clinics across the country to date located in strategic residential, commercial and industrial areas. Not only that, truly comprehensive care is provided at every clinic to clients from all walks of life. The team of professional doctors and healthcare assistants work tirelessly to ensure the patient’s diagnosis, treatment and well-being are cared for to the best of their abilities.

name: Klinik Pergigian IMC Dental
desc: Ensure that you have a clean bill of health at IMC Medical Group, Johor Bahru’s first medical and dental integrated clinic. Your convenience and health is the top priority, which is why this clinic provides comprehensive medical care and service at fully-accessible locations. You’ll never miss another health checkup again!

name: Marrybrown
desc: An international award winning quick service restaurant chain with 400 outlets worldwide and the world’s largest Halal brand - Marrybrown is proudly owned and operated by Malaysians. A true home-grown success that deliciously fused western fast-food with eastern flavors in their signature meals like satay burger, mee curry, chicken porridge and nasi Marrybrown alongside perennial favorites like Fish ‘n’ Chips, fun fries, salads and finger food. With outstanding service, great food and value-priced meals, this is the place to grab a quick tasty treat !

name: MASTER TAM 谭师傅
desc: Destress, Me-time, wanting a little luxury in your life? Escape life’s daily stress at Master Tam with rejuvenating and therapeutic Borneo Massage, created from the best of Chinese, Malay and Indonesian massage styles with skilled masseurs from Sabah and Sarawak. Indulge also in manicures, pedicures and waxing services for a truly blissful experience for you.

name: Mr Dakgalbi Restaurant
desc: Come by Mr. Dakgalbi when you’re craving Korean food! Much like its namesake, Mr. Dakgalbi’s most popular dish is the dakgalbi, which is a spicy stir-fried chicken dish cooked in a delicious gojuchang-based sauce. This simple but mighty dish is prepared right in front of the customers, stir-fried to perfection with assorted fresh vegetables, tteok (glutinous rice cake), and kimchi. If you’re feeling fancy, you can add your choice of carb or additional ingredients such as shrimp, octopus, or cheese! Fancy something else? Mr. Dakgalbi also serves mouthwatering Korean fried rice and lip-smacking seafood pancake so there’s always something for everyone!

name: Nail By Le Beauty
desc: The perfect hang-out for you and your friends to pamper your feet and hands with super-luxe manicures, pedicures and all related services at Nail By Le Beauty. With professionally trained, experienced and friendly technicians offering over 400 different shades of high quality nail polish at value prices, this is a truly lavish affair that will not break your bank.

name: Nails Deco Gallery
desc: We all need a boost when it comes to the art of looking good. Nails Decor is here to polish you up with nail care services such as manicures, pedicures and enhancements! Give the rest of you an extra oomph with their essential beauty services such as eyelash extensions and waxing. Don’t sweat it––the staff here are discreet and absolutely professional, determined to bring out the best in you with every session.

name: Pet Lovers Centre
desc: Operating over 113 stores across five countries, Pet Lovers Centre is internationally recognised for providing the widest range of the freshest and finest quality pet food such as trusted brands like Fish4Dogs, Fish4Cats, Burp!, Barking Heads, Meowing Heads, Cat’s Best, Trustie and many more. Accompanied by vet-trained professional consultants, accessories and essential all-pet related services - this is truly a pet lovers haven.

name: PS Floral Atelier
desc: PS Flower Atelier is your one-stop boutique florist shop that provides fresh and luxe floral bouquets for all occasions or you can make your own arrangements at our DIY corner. Truly for the floral lover, we also provide workshops in floral arrangement and even special care services that provide plenty of TLC that would treat, care and heal any plant care concerns.

name: Ramah Ramah
desc: Jom, makan! At Ramah-Ramah, the food isn’t just tasty, it’s a wallet-friendly flavour fiesta! Serving authentic Malaysian cuisines at unbeatable prices, this homegrown eatery never skimps on using quality ingredients to cook up delicious traditional recipes. Step right into this cosy nook for a delightful meal, prepared hot and fresh just for you!

name: REMAX
desc: If it’s tech-related, Remax has it. This tech accessory brand caters to the generation that is constantly on the move. From bluetooth devices to keep music pumping, powerbanks and chargers to stay juiced, and phone cases to stay stylish––Remax is your one-stop shop for all your accessories and gadgets! All the products in store are regulated for quality, and curated for style. There are even novelty tech items that would make attractive gifts!

name: Sheldonet Toy Store
desc: One is never too old for fun. Come by Sheldonet Toy Store and have fun checking out a wide range of pop culture toys and collectibles from global brands such as FUNKO, Bleacher Creatures, Cartamundi, and SoccerStarz. A tonne of fun is waiting in store just for you!

name: Siam Oasis
desc: Siam Oasis is a wellness management company with extensive experience in providing creative solutions for traditional spa businesses. Siam Oasis offers a wide range of massage services, performed by experienced therapists to help you live a healthier modern lifestyle. Each service is a great way to let you escape from all the bustle of life.

name: Siam Oasis
desc: Siam Oasis is a wellness management company with extensive experience in providing creative solutions for traditional spa business. Siam Oasis offers a wide range of massage services, performed by experienced therapists to help you live a healthier modern lifestyle. Each service is a great way to let you escape from all the bustle of life.

name: Sukiya
desc: Come into Sukiya for a taste of Japanese pop culture. Considered a Japanese comfort food, Gyudon (beef bowl) is a hearty meal of hot rice topped with thin beef slices simmered in broth. Sukiya is ranked No.1 Gyudon chain restaurant, so be prepared to enjoy a truly delectable meal! The menu also offers favourites such as tasty Ramen, Chicken Bowls, and unique Japanese Curry. The atmosphere is reminiscent of daily life in urban Japan, making the dining experience even more authentic.

name: Supreme Bowl
desc: Bowl in the dark in this glow-in-the-dark bowling alley! Supreme Bowl sets itself apart from traditional bowling alleys, featuring neon-lit lanes that light the way to thrilling bowling strikes. Whether you’re here to bowl it out with friends or to have a great time, Supreme Bowl promises fun for all with other games like 8-ball pools and electronic darts as well as food and drinks that can satisfy any cravings. Not only that, it offers out-of-the-world experiences with its futuristic and vibrant atmosphere, making it a great place for hosting parties. Get your friends and family together for a fun and memorable hang-out experience here!

name: Thai Odyssey
desc: Step into a peaceful yet enchanting haven of relaxation. At Thai Odyssey, the serene tranquillity embraces the senses and the healing hands of skilled therapists uplift your physical and mental well-being. With restful thoughts and a peaceful mind, pamper and luxuriate in relaxing Thai massages and aromatherapy that will nurture the body and soul.

name: The Craft Décor
desc: Creativity is unleashed at The Craft Decor, a place where personalisation is celebrated through getting crafty! A wonderful selection of artificial flowers, plants, decor accessories, door gifts and many more are available––how you use it is entirely up to you! This is a great destination to visit if you want to personalise your living space or special occasions such as weddings and parties.

name: Toy World Amusement X PinkFong Bebefinn
desc: Pinkfong Bebefinn-themed indoor playground by Toy World Amusement, specially designed for toddlers and young children aged 1–12. The play centre offers a safe and engaging environment with fun-filled zones like ball pools, slides, trampolines, and more. It’s the perfect place for little ones to explore, play, learn, and create joyful memories with family and friends.

name: VR+Zone
desc: VR entertainment looks like it’s here to stay, so jump right into it and immerse yourself in the challenges it offers! VR+Zone is a space that has a myriad of VR scenarios: take off into space in a shuttle, escape a virtual prison or defeat enemies in a haunted house however you like! You’ll enjoy endless hours of fun here with friends new and old, so round them up and get the party started!

name: Wk Design
desc: Starting in 2015, WK Design has been filling the needs in our time surrounded by technology. Hands on in offering one of a kind accessories, WK Design provides contemporary designs to complement every latest mobiles. Look stylish in their range of Bluetooth earphones, share multiple high speed charging cables with your loved ones or get car mobile accessories for your trip, definitely a one-stop destination!

name: Absolute Thai
desc: Absolute Thai is a must for those who enjoy the vibrant flavours of Thailand. With over 20 years of experience, the restaurant believes in serving authentic Thai cuisine with hospitality from the heart. The use of authentic Thai spices and fresh ingredients creates a blend of flavours and aroma to every dish. Pick up the menu, and you will find delicious staples such as Tom Yam Kung, Pad Thai, a selection of hot curries and many more. All this is perfect with a bowl of pearly white rice, with a final sweet touch of Red Rubies or Sticky Mango Rice for dessert!

name: adidas
desc:
Football, basketball, running, training...Adidas has all this and more. Known for
its constantly evolving technology, Adidas changes lives with its high
performance sportswear. The extensive range includes footwear, apparel, bags
and accessories, all designed for you to achieve your fitness goals!

name: ANTA
desc: ANTA sportswear made its debut in the industry since 1991, with its brand focusing on functional sports attire and stands to lead internationally in the sports field of running, basketball, cross-training for its footwear, apparel and accessories varieties. The brand also offers subtle designs with an edgy touch, yet implementing sports science and innovation in their product development, prioritizing comfort in high performance standard making it accessible to everyone’s lifestyle with its affordable price range.

name: Arashi Shabu-Shabu
desc: Arashi Shabu-Shabu gives you a deliciously wholesome Japanese hotpot experience like no other! You’ll be served your very own hotspot with a choice of soup base. Then, choose from a selection of freshly prepared ingredients, which will also be served individually to you! All you have to do next is enjoy your personalised meal in the comfort of a refined, tranquil environment.

name: Art Friend
desc: Whether you are a professional artist or a hobby artist, Art Friend is the place to get all the tools you need for all your creative projects! Since 1981, Art Friend has been serving fine artists, graphic designers, crafters, hobbyists, and creative individuals as well as companies in the design industry with its vast catalogue of anything and everything arts and crafts related. Explore the different tools, paints, oils, brushes, pencils, papers, canvases, etc. and experiment with different textures and formulas to create your next masterpiece! Art Friend is a must-visit for every creative professional and art enthusiast alike.

name: asics
desc: From daily commuting to outdoor adventures, ASICS has footwear and apparel to see you through your activity of choice. The Japanese brand has been developing activewear for over 50 years, hitting the sweet spot of form and function over and over again. Innovative technologies such as core GEL cushioning and Flytefoam encourage users to go further with every step they take. This eventually led to a range of performance-enhancing sports shoes and apparel that are perfect for professional athletes and active consumers alike.

name: Aurum Theatre
desc: Aurum Theatre is a new flagship ultra-luxurious boutique cinema by Golden Screen Cinemas. Featuring three halls with specially-designed Getha luxury recliners and Jin Gastrobar, a contemporary fine dining restaurant-bar – this is the ultimate place to indulge in a true cinematic luxury experience. Whether you’re just visiting to wine and dine or catching a movie with friends, Aurum Theatre is the place to pamper yourselves and loved ones or celebrate special occasions.

name: Bao Jun Hot Pot
desc: The best meals are shared with loved ones. It is for that exact reason that steamboats are associated with warmth, laughter and a roaring good time! Gather your family, gather your friends; head to Bào Jūn Hot Pot for a grand time. Featuring a steamboat buffet with a wide variety of dishes, sauces, soup bases and more, explore new flavours you’ve never tasted before!

name: Beutea
desc: Enjoy an exquisite cup of tea beverage from Beutea! Beutea’s unique blends of Chinese tea with fresh milk and fresh fruits introduce new interesting flavours that refresh the palate and renew one’s love for tea. Each brew on the menu is crafted using an ancient four-step tea ceremony technique – moisten, soak, boil, and brew – to bring out the best flavours from the tea leaves just for you. Take a sip of these beautifully crafted tea beverages while relaxing in this modern teahouse!

name: BWAVE
desc: If you are one of those trendsetters whose style is fun and quirky, BWAVE has got good news for you. Originally a curated clothing website inspired by culture, music, film, literature, art, and everything in between, BWAVE has brought their collection of apparel to the offline world for you to shop to your heart’s content. Their collection of independent and fashion-forward clothing, accessories, and bags will ensure that you would always be at the forefront of fashion!

name: Carl's Jr
desc: From hot dog cart to booming burger brand, Carl’s Jr has certainly gone a long way from its humble Californian beginnings. Carl’s Jr is now a premier burger brand that serves big juicy burgers made from premium quality ingredients. While you’re here, indulge in crisp hand-breaded chicken and cool shakes made from real ice-cream! It’s service with a smile all day, everyday here as your food is brought to the table by friendly staff––a true taste of Californian hospitality.

name: Common Sense
desc: Common Sense is all about having fun expressing yourself through graphic tees! Play with different styles and t-shirt collections with your favourite characters on them. On top of the t-shirts featuring your favourite childhood mascots, you will also find matching tote bags, socks, and caps that complete every collection. Each t-shirt collection is designed in a mix of street style and casual wear.

name: Converse
desc: For as long as anyone cares to remember, Converse has been bringing the creative scene Chuck Taylor All Star and One Star sneakers. They are continuously revamping street style classics while redefining trends in sport, street and creative culture. A universally accepted symbol of style, Converse products––footwear, apparel, caps and accessories––will look just as good on a red carpet celebrity or you. The secret? It’s because you are owning it with your personality and unique self!

name: Crocs
desc: There’s a good reason why Crocs has sold millions of shoes the world over. The classic Crocs clogs are made of lightweight, comfortable, odour-resistant resin––an absolute game-changer for casual shoes that suit a multitude of occasions! Since the arrival of Crocs clogs, the brand has diversified its offerings with flip flops, sandals, loafers and more. There are currently several distinct footwear collections for men, women and children all aimed to provide maximum comfort so that you may come as you are.

name: Crossover Concept Store
desc: Established right here in the heart of Johor Bahru, Crossover began as a small sneaker store by one man’s passion for sneakers. The brand is now known as a go-to haven for like-minded sneakerheads to seek out hard-to-find brands and upcoming streetwear names. Crossover carries a strongly curated collection for those who love independence and self-expression––it’s also a great place to discover a new culture and meet new people!

name: Crossover Concept Store
desc: Established right here in the heart of Johor Bahru, Crossover began as a small sneaker store by one man’s passion for sneakers. The brand is now known as a go-to haven for like-minded sneakerheads to seek out hard-to-find brands and upcoming streetwear names. Crossover carries a strongly curated collection for those who love independence and self-expression––it’s also a great place to discover a new culture and meet new people!

name: Elle Hair Academy
desc:
Begin your hairdressing career today at ELLE Hair Academy - a widely recognised hair academy founded by Mr. Simon Koh. With his decades of hairdressing experience and his amazing ELLE Artistic Team, they are eager to share all their hairdressing knowledge, skills, and experiences with you throughout the course. Don’t know where to begin? Just make an appointment and learn from
the professional.

name: Elle Hair Studio
desc: Get your best hairdo yet at ELLE Hair Studio, a hair salon spearheaded by founder and artistic director Mr. Simon Koh. The experienced hair stylists here know exactly what they’re doing, and will be happy to discuss your needs before giving you a haircut you’ll fall in love with. Your tresses can also be pampered with the numerous hair treatments and dyeing services on offer. Don’t know where to begin? Just make an appointment and make the cut!

name: Felancy
desc: Expressing body-loving confidence through silhouettes that best fit the needs, Felancy offers numerous ranges from lingerie - junior to adult, shapewear and nightwear collection; even made available to the gents now. Every piece is made nominally priced with high-quality materials that perfectly fit our humid weather. Wait no more and stop by to shop your favourite piece now!

name: Fipper
desc: Fipper is all about walking in comfort and confidence, bringing quality flip flops to the world! Made of natural rubber, Fipper slippers come in a myriad of eye-popping colours and styles. It’s simply a matter of choosing one that best suits you––the rest is just fun and adventure!

name: Fix Banana Leaf
desc: Indulge in the intense flavours of South Indian cuisine, rich in aromatic spices and tangy tamarind! Fix Banana Leaf serves authentic South Indian dishes using traditional recipes and the finest ingredients. From mouthwatering curries to heavenly coastal delicacies, Fix Banana Leaf has a delectable menu that promises unforgettable culinary journeys.

name: FIX IT ALL Auto Detailing
desc: Your car would look better than ever with FIX IT ALL Auto Detailing! It’s a one stop service that provides car washing, polishing and detailing. With more than 10 years experience in the industry, you can be sure that your car is in good hands. FIX IT ALL Auto Detailing also prides itself on assessing the service needs of customers and giving great solutions, rather than just providing a service. This keeps customers’ coming back and their cars clean and polished.

name: GIGI Coffee
desc: Get your caffeine fix at Gigi Coffee! Gigi Coffee is all about serving coffee on the go made from freshly roasted and ground 100% Arabica beans. Pick your choice of roasts: the medium dark roast from Indonesia offer an earthy taste with a hint of dark chocolaty sweetness while the medium roast from Colombia is velvety yet citrusy with a nutty hint. Don’t forget to take a peep at their seasonal menu for a creative twist on your favourite caffeine and non-caffeine beverages!

name: Gong cha
desc: Sip and savour chewy bubble tea at Gong Cha! Hailing from Kaohsiung, Taiwan, Gong Cha has been stirring up bubble teas globally since 2009. The term “Gong Cha” embodies the ancient Chinese tradition of presenting tea as a royal gift, expressing their passion to delight tea enthusiasts around the world with their premium milk teas. Take a delightful sip of their freshly brewed tea topped with a creamy layer of fresh milk foam, or indulge in some good old bubble milk tea!

name: GriPP
desc: Everyone needs a pair of comfortable rubber slippers! GriPP has an ever-growing selection of colourful flip-flops, slippers, and sandals that will get you excited for your next outdoor adventure. Whether you need a pair for the beach or sightseeing in tropical countries, GriPP’s cool, colourful, and practical sandals are all you need to style your feet.

name: G-Shock Store
desc: G-Shock is no stranger to the wristwear game: the brand has a devoted following for their range of digital and analogue watches. Featuring the latest collections of G-Shock, Baby-G, Edifice, Sheen and Protrek watches, this is the place to be if you’re looking to one-up your accessory style!

name: Hoops Station
desc: Hoops Station is every basketballer’s dream: the leading Basketball Specialty retailer has the widest selection of footwear, apparel accessories, equipment and lifestyle products for the game! Not only do they offer the best of premium brands and styles, they also work with major sports brands so that you have access to the very all season long. If you want to stay ahead of the game, head to Hoops Station today.

name: HYPE
desc: HYPE Clothing Co. brings together a fusion of classic American subcultures with a local twist. The apparel collection offers both trendy men and women options in tops, trousers, caps, accessories and more. The casual, free-and-easy style here complements those who seek out individuality and urban trends.

name: HYPE
desc: HYPE Clothing Co. brings together a fusion of classic American subcultures with a local twist. The apparel collection offers both trendy men and women options in tops, trousers, caps, accessories and more. The casual, free-and-easy style here complements those who seek out individuality and urban trends.

name: Impulse Gaming
desc: Impulse Gaming is every gamer’s haven – video games, consoles, gaming peripherals, accessories, and more in every corner of the store! Whether you’re a pro player or a casual gamer, you will find what you need to beat high scores. Step into this gamer’s paradise and supercharge your hobby to the next level with toys, figurines, blind boxes, and much more!

name: Impulse Gaming
desc: Impulse Gaming is every gamer’s haven – video games, consoles, gaming peripherals, accessories, and more in every corner of the store! Whether you’re a pro player or a casual gamer, you will find what you need to beat high scores. Step into this gamer’s paradise and supercharge your hobby to the next level with toys, figurines, blind boxes, and much more!

name: Jean Yip
desc: Firm to their core value; “Trust, Value & Friendliness”, Jean Yip has a strong team of more than 800 professionals in offering all-inclusive beauty services; from hairdressing to beauty, and slimming. Jean Yip strives to convey their most effective and quality alongside its latest technology of products for their clients. Leading the industry with their specialty, Jean Yip has been awarded numerously and will continuously hold onto their secret success of excellent relationship with the community.

name: JIN Gastrobar by Aurum Theatre
desc: With an approach of a relaxed wine and dine, Jin Gastrobar is the perfect place to unwind after your long day. Having experienced chefs prepping your choice of appetizers to main courses, Jin Gastrobar offers  authentic cuisine made with only high-grade ingredients, bringing you an amazing culinary experience first hand. Pick from breakfast to dinner with your loved ones to lounge in or just listening to the jazz soothing melodies over cocktails and sharing canapes.

name: Kappa
desc: Modernly designed with technical function in their sportswear collection, Italian sports and lifestyle brand, Kappa, has been one of the world’s largest Italian Sports & Lifestyle brands since 1967. Kappa is best known amongst sports clubs such as football, rugby and basketball, providing suitably designed apparel to accessories with collections from stylish chic fashion pieces, streetwear, sportswear and sports equipment.

name: Kinsahi
desc: Enjoy a premium Japanese dining experience at Kinsahi where fine dining meets authentic Japanese flavours. All ingredients are sourced for their freshness and authenticity in order to create delicious, exclusive dishes. Vegetarians will love to know that Kinsahi also has an ever-expanding menu of Japanese vegetarian dishes!

name: LOJEL
desc: LOJEL creates carry essentials that simplify movement, enabling individuals to focus on what matters. Founded in Japan in 1989, LOJEL’s mission is to empower journeys with products that promote mindful movement & sustainability. Guided by 3 key principles—"Less, but better" ensuring quality design; "Simply User-Centric" prioritizing your needs; & "Modern Movement" offering adaptable solutions—LOJEL delivers innovative solutions for all movement, from international travel to everyday commutes.

name: Lucky Mala Noodle
desc:
A perfect bowl of MalaTang is from a recipe that has been a heritage passed on for generations over 100 years through a series of trial and error. It’s the foundation of flavor in every bowl of soup. Using only the finest selection of beef and pork bones, our broth is boiled for more than 10 hours, using 18 different types of spices, along with traditional Chinese herbs.
It is then cooked till golden, which signifies that it’s ready! Choose your favourite ingredients, level of spiciness and numbness, and you’ll enjoy a heavenly bowl of Lucky Mala Noodle!

name: M.U OPTIK
desc: Mentari Unggul (MU) Optik provides eyewear products and services under one roof. The fast-expanding company strives to offer quality lenses and frames to their customers while maintaining reasonable price points. Also available are comprehensive eye examination services that cover eye pressure, degrees of myopia and presbyopia, astigmatism, retina and eye structure. Everything needed for healthy eyes is right here at MU Optik!

name: MiX.STORE
desc: MiX has developed an online fan base for their selection of regional snacks, food and beverages. If you crave a snack from your favourite K-Drama, or want to revisit your favourite Taiwanese snack, chances are you will find it here. You will also find self-heating hot pots from China, ice creams from Japan, instant meals from Thailand, crisps from Indonesia and so much more! Don’t wait, start shopping at MiX today.

name: Momo Nail Concept
desc: Manis and pedis are a delightful treat, and Momo Nail Concept takes the experience up a notch with nail art designs that range from demure to outstanding. Asides from a rad manicure, you can also enjoy beauty services such as hair removal and bridal makeup here. Mix and match the services on offer and you’ll leave Momo Nail Concept a more radiant, confident woman!

name: Nam Heong Ipoh
desc: Meet the gatekeepers for a rich Ipoh heritage: Nam Heong White Coffee. The coffee shop has been spreading the state’s culinary treasures across Asia, serving delectable dishes that range from savoury noodles and dim sum to sweet desserts. The full menu is best paired with a cup of Nam Heong Ipoh white coffee for a truly unforgettable experience!

name: New Balance
desc: New Balance is a proud American footwear brand based in Boston, Massachusetts. It is the only major shoe company that manufactures athletic footwear in the US and the UK. The brand is known the world over for its innovative sports shoes and apparel that accommodate a whole spectrum of users. Many swear by the brand’s footwear as it delivers comfort and maximum performance with every run!

name: New Era
desc: After decades as the official on-field cap of MLB, New Era is now the go-to brand for exclusive sports headwear. With classic cap styles, superb quality and embroidered team logos across 3 major U.S leagues, this is the ultimate symbol of a true fan. New Era headwear also has its own following in the urban streetwear scene for their versatility and style. If you want in on this, head over to New Era today!

name: Nike
desc: You’ve heard all about it, now it’s time for you to Just Do It. Nike is here with a mission to expand human potential through groundbreaking, high-performance sports wear. Find ergonomic footwear for popular sports and activities as well as training attire, accessories and fitness technology. Not only that, Nike goes the extra mile by pushing for sustainably-made products, while creating a diverse global team and waves of community impact. That’s a lot of positive energy put into each item here!

name: OVER
desc: OVER is more than just a brand; it’s your go-to for sports products that help you reach your peak performance. With a focus on quality, OVER aims to create a community that supports local athletes, celebrates victories, and sparks positive change. Whether you're hydrating or recovering, OVER is here to help you be your best self, one sip at a time!

name: Palsaik Korean BBQ
desc: Fun fact: Palsaik means ‘Eight Colours’ in Korean, and it is best known in Palsaik Samgyupsal: a famous pork belly dish from South Korea! Palsaik Korean BBQ prides themselves in providing an authentic experience for you to enjoy this eight-coloured pork belly dish. You’ll be bowled over by the colours and flavours of the dish’s spectrum: Ginseng, Wine, Pine Needles, Garlic, Herb, Curry, Miso and Gochujang (Korean red pepper paste)––each has been carefully prepared for maximum impact. Grilling the meat releases its marinade and natural juices, creating an unforgettable meal! If you want a slice of Korea without booking a flight, Palsaik Korean BBQ is a must visit.

name: PopCorn Food Hall
desc: Solve the age-old question of ‘what to eat?’ at PopCorn Hall, an international non-halal food hall bursting with tasty options! Choose from local delicacies to tempting eats from around the world. No matter your choice, each meal will be prepared with fresh, quality ingredients for your enjoyment!

name: RA-MEN BANKARA
desc: Ramen Bankara is a Tokyo staple, now here to serve its steaming bowls of ramen to famished locals! It’s no secret that the broth is its winning quality: pork bones and ingredients are simmered for hours on end to produce a creamy, rich soup base for springy noodles and toppings such as chashu, onsen eggs, seaweed and more. Each ramen bowl is prepared upon order so you know you’re getting a fresh, hearty meal every time!

name: Salomon
desc: Fuel your passion for outdoor sports! Founded in 1947 in the heart of the French Alps, Annecy, Salomon is a trailblazing footwear brand that is all about performance and innovation. Superior in function, radical in design, and obsessive in style, Salomon designs performance apparel for every level of running and style. Unleash the best version of yourself and transform your sports experiences with Salomon!

name: SEK TONG by 深夜食糖
desc: For those who love Hong Kong for its delicious desserts, head to 深夜食糖 SYST to fulfil your cravings! The dessert house has a menu filled with traditional Hong Kong tong shui and snacks, prepared with quality ingredients. Fall in love with the fragrant Mango Pomelo Sago and Black Sesame Soup, then sample dishes such as Macaroni, Curry Fish Balls, Salted Egg Toast and so much more! The neon lights and communal benches are also a nod to the classic Hong Kong experience, providing an atmosphere that feels just like the real thing.

name: Shihlin Taiwan Street Snacks
desc: Everyone’s favourite Taiwanese food chain is here! Featuring night market staples, Shihlin Taiwan Street Snacks is the place to enjoy authentically prepared dishes like XXL Crispy Chicken, Crispy Floss Egg Crepe, Handmade Oyster Mee Sua and Seafood Tempura. Everything is made to order with fresh ingredients for the ultimate crunch or slurp! Want a taste of Taiwan’s street food culture? Get it right here at Shihlin Taiwan Street Snacks.

name: Shojikiya
desc: Discover your favourite Japanese snacks and food items here at Shojikiya! Packed with over 1000 food products imported from Japan, you will find candies, chocolates, cookies, biscuits, chips, seaweed, ice-cream, frozen foods, oils, sauces, beverages, and even wines made in Japan. Shojikiya brings to you the latest popular items from all over Japan and makes sure to have an extensive range of items – including new and exotic products – for you to choose from. Visit Shojikiya today to pick out a new Japanese snack or learn how to cook amazing Japanese food using authentic cooking ingredients!

name: Showcase
desc: Smudged, worn, slippery or thin soles? Drop by Showcase, the one-stop solution to breath new life into your old footwear or to protect your brand new ones. Offering services from cleaning to water-repellent treatment of your footwear to head accessories, come visit us to put new shine into your most prized possessions.

name: Sin Man Kee HK Char Chan Teng
desc: Experience what it’s like dining in a char chan teng in Hong Kong at Sin Man Kee HK Char Chan Teng! Serving up delicious beef noodles perfected over three generations, this cosy eatery knows how to deliver flavourful meals that pack a punch. Slurp on savoury beef noodles, indulge in heavenly Hainanese chicken rice, and revel in the spice of HK style lamb curry! Don’t forget to pair your mains with a rich cup of milk tea and end your meal on a high note with their flaky Portuguese egg tart.

name: Soxworld
desc: Warm essentials and more can be found right here at Soxworld, a retail outlet that specialises in socks, undergarments, winter accessories, caps and sleepwear. You will definitely find something that captures your heart, as the shelves are stocked with designs for any stylish individual! From novelty graphics to sleek and understated, everything here is a joyful addition to your warm wear wardrobe.

name: Sun Paradise
desc: There is always something inviting about cool, sparkling waters, and Sun Paradise has all the apparel you need to accept the invitation! Be it a beach hangout or pool party, this retailer has you covered in aquatic wear and accessories. Find dozens of designs for swimwear here: one-piece suits, tankinis, bikinis, trunks, surfwear and even a special modesty range of Muslim swimwear. For those who want to take it up a notch, Sun Paradise also offers a range of dive gear and snorkel equipment, too.

name: Sushi Zanmai
desc: Enjoy an authentic Japanese meal experience at Sushi Zanmai, home to the quintessential conveyor-belt sushi! More than 100 sushi assortments are available, prepared by hand with the freshest ingredients. If you want more than bite-sized delights, peruse the menu of mouth-watering Japanese dishes such as udon, tempura and rice sets. Sushi Zanmai also brings monthly delicacies from Japan, so go often to get a taste of what’s in season!

name: The Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf
desc: Every drink is handcrafted with love at The Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf! From light and subtle roasts to dark and distinctive cups of liquid gold, the passionate baristas here are always ready to serve. Enjoy your favourite brew alongside delicious pastries or all-day breakfast. Don’t forget to try something from the seasonal drinks menu when you’re feeling extra fancy!

name: Timberland
desc: You’re probably no stranger to this iconic outdoor footwear, apparel and accessories brand. Designed with a passion for the community spirit, it’s the one- stop gear outfitter for anyone who wants to connect with and enjoy the great outdoors.

name: Tokyo Japanese Cuisine
desc: Tokyo Japanese Cuisine offers over 300 Japanese dishes, including sashimi, sushi, tempura, Wagyu beef, ramen, hand rolls, sushi rolls, appetizers, and elaborate set meals. The restaurant's elegant and simple interior design features wooden furniture and decor, creating a soft-toned, warm, and attentive atmosphere from the moment you step through the doors.

name: Vans
desc: At Vans, it’s all about self expression through street culture! The brand is internationally known for its originality in footwear, apparel and accessories. It is beyond a street fashion label, however. Vans encourages youths through its various creative platforms such as Vans Park Series, Vans Triple Crown of Surfing®, Vans Pool Party, Vans Custom Culture, and Vans’ cultural hub and international music venue, House of Vans. Lace up a pair and take your style onto the streets now.

name: Watsons
desc: “Look good, feel great” in the world of Watson. With thousands of stores around Asia and Europe, the world of Watson has expanded to become Asia’s leading health and beauty retailer AND the No. 1 pharmacy brand in Asia. Find anything from skincare, cosmetics, beauty and healthcare products to pharmaceutical drugs right here, with personalized advice and counseling in health, beauty and personal care tailored to your very needs.

name: Zirconia Jewellery
desc: For jewellery that heightens your lifestyle, Zirconia Jewellery has something to offer! With a vision to ‘shine your style with your sense of beauty’, the jewellery collections are of highest quality and carefully designed with your needs in mind. From statement pieces to everyday accessories, you’ll never leave the store without wanting more!

name: AsterSpring
desc:
AsterSpring commits to give you a whole new refreshing experience, personalized to your overall skin health using specialized innovative facial treatments and incorporating homecare regimens with world leading brands including Dermalogica, the No.1 professional skincare globally, AsterSpring deliver the highest standard of skills and service quality that you can be - just relax, enjoy and see the visible results!

TRUST, the best hands deliver RESULTS.

name: Aveda
desc: Aveda was founded with a mission to create natural, high performance hair care solutions that are gentle for you and the planet. With its ayurvedic roots, you’ll find that the hair care systems developed here not only treat your hair or scalp, but also provides an overall sense of wellbeing. Their wide range of products is 95% naturally derived and harvested from ingredients all over the world, proven to restore hair from the inside out.

name: BabyShop
desc: Trusted by parents around the world, BabyShop is a one-stop destination for all the things you need for your little ones. Discover charming nursery furniture, effortless travel systems, and quality feeding essentials that make parenting as easy as ABC. Introduce your angelface to educational toys and find cute clothing for newborn babies and children up to age 10, all in one place.

name: CelcomDigi
desc: Need a one-stop shop for all your mobile needs? Then make sure you head to CelcomDigi, where you’ll find everything to make life more convenient and easy. From the latest gadgets to the best mobile and internet plans in town, CelcomDigi is all about helping you make the right choices. Expect professional and friendly services from customer service assistants who will help guide you into getting just what you need – no frills, no fuss. Check it out now for the convenience you’ve always wanted!

name: CHAGEE 霸王茶姬
desc: From the birthplace of tea in Yunnan, China, CHAGEE is here to bring back the beautiful heritage of Chinese tea culture sprinkled with a modern twist. Appreciate tea in its many different forms – infused in a classic teapot, brewed into a lovely milk tea or macchiato, or even as a fruit tea. The calming sound of trickling tea, soothing music playing in the background, and fragrant aroma of steeping tea will entice your senses as you step into the store and leave you wanting a taste of that delicious brew.

name: Chicco
desc: Being a pioneer in the baby and children product industry, Chicco Recaro prioritizes and comprehends every parents’ and child’s needs. Focusing on identifying common issues from strollers to carseats and researching to improve through innovative solutions. Believing that parenting is an unforeseeable adventure, the brand is here to walk alongside you with a helping hand, giving you the best tips in looking out for the suitable product for your little ones.

name: DAISO Japan
desc: Daiso Japan is a franchise of 100-yen shops with an impressive range of over 100,000 products. You can find almost anything on the shelves catered to departments such as stationery, kitchen, beauty, home decor and more. All the functional products are a delight to look at and are made of quality materials. This adheres to Daiso’s emphasis on ‘Quality’, ‘Variety’ and ‘Uniqueness’. No matter what you’re here for, you will leave Daiso feeling more than satisfied!

name: Design Skin
desc: A torch of modernity, HONOR is a brand that emerged from the needs of a young, tech-savvy generation. The brand is now one of the trendiest tech brands for youths that seek form, function and cutting-edge technology in one product. They are best known for their flagship smartphones, but also offer a range of gadgets and accessories that stand way out from the crowd.

name: D'LUXE Studio Spa
desc: Your hair needs to be pampered, too! Get the royal treatment at D'LUXE Studio Spa, where professionals provide exceptional hair services. Adopting the unique Japanese value of “omotenashi”, staff here will go the extra mile to ensure comfort and satisfaction during your appointment. Simply immerse yourself in the serene ambience, as your tresses are anointed with products and equipment that protect both hair and scalp. A fabulous hairdo awaits!

name: DVC Borneo Wellness
desc: Destress, Me-time, wanting a little luxury in your life? Escape life’s daily stress at DVC Borneo Wellness with rejuvenating and therapeutic Borneo Massage, created from the best of Chinese, Malay and Indonesian massage styles with skilled masseurs from Sabah and Sarawak. Indulge also in manicures, pedicures and waxing services for a truly blissful experience for you.

name: Dzi Kingdom
desc: A Dzi (‘zee’) Bead is known in Tibetan culture as a gemstone that brings fortune and luck to the wearer. Every antique bead is handpicked from Tibet and the Himalayan mountains to assure its authenticity and quality. To find out which gemstone is best for you, step into Dzi Kingdom and explore the handpicked selection of Dzi beads that will bring prosperity, health, protection, compassion and healing into your life.

name: e Artistic
desc: If funky and fun, pretty and gorgeous nails are what you are looking for - head to E ARTISTIC for a luxuriously pampering experience with a wide selection of lacquers, gel polish and nail art services. So come and let our well-trained technicians indulge you to help you look your very best.

name: ECHOLAC
desc: Travel in style with Echolac! From premium to eco-friendly, and everything in between, Echolac has luggage cases fit for every traveller. Crafted from extremely durable and lightweight EchoLite polycarbonate, every Echolac luggage case comes with TSA-approved locks and almost-silent, 360-degree wheels for easy navigation. Its spacious interiors with multiple compartments make it wonderfully easy to pack and live out of your luggage, especially when space is limited. Get an Echolac for your next travels today!

name: Eyesmate Optometrist
desc: Shower your eyes with some tender, loving, care at Eyesmate Optometrist, an optical centre that has been operating for over 2 decades. Professional eye consultations are top priority here, as the visionaries at Eyesmate see the need for quality eye care in the market. At least one optometrist is stationed at every outlet to utilise advanced devices for sharp, accurate consultations. Step inside today and give your eyes the attention it deserves!

name: Fitness Concept
desc: Reach all your fitness goals with Fitness Concept––the health and fitness retailer provides a wide range of solutions from some of the best international brands. You’ll be able to test out treadmills, exercise bikes and training systems in-store. While you’re there, stock up on fitness apparel and accessories from renowned brands like Adidas, Reebok, Garmin and more!

name: Foto CLS Sdn Bhd
desc: If you’re looking for cameras that outperform any other in the market, Olympus is the answer. Remarkably stylish design matched with powerful features and high performance capabilities makes for the perfect shooting companion, if we don’t say so ourselves. Come in for a hands-on demo today.

name: GAIAS
desc: Your home is a sanctuary of comfort and elegance, and GAIAS embodies refined minimalism with handcrafted bedding and bath essentials crafted from the finest materials. As a homegrown lifestyle brand, GAIAS is committed to creating the world’s healthiest, softest, and most sustainable products, enhancing your everyday living with quality and quiet elegance.

name: Getha
desc: Specializing in 100% Natural Latex since 1969, bedding experts GETHA has a wide range of products suitable for all ages and needs! From pillows for babies, teens and adults, to mattresses, bed frames, sleep and travel accessories, GETHA products are perfect with the best comfort and support for your slumber, or as a gift for a loved one! Whether it is on-the-go or for your sleep sanctuary, create your ultimate comfort indulgence with GETHA’s range of safe and EMF free products!

name: Honor
desc: Unveil the latest array of smart gadgets from HONOR! From cutting-edge smartphones to versatile wearables and powerful laptops, each product boasts exceptional performance and stunning design. With their sleek aesthetics and innovative features, HONOR’s lineup of intelligent devices effortlessly complements any busy lifestyle.

name: Hooga
desc: Enjoy the ultimate cosy living with HOOGA, where simplicity and rustic products reign supreme. HOOGA strives to provide home furnishings like cushions, bedding, furniture and everything else you need to enjoy the simple pleasures in life, right at home. Shop at HOOGA today for a comfy, snuggly time!

name: Huawei
desc: Huawei has scaled the tech ranks rapidly, and is now a popular choice for smartphone enthusiasts. The Huawei store features the brand’s best products in one place, so that customers can walk in and discover it all with the help of friendly store assistants. Find flagship smart devices, tablets and wearables right here, all with the quintessential seal of Huawei quality and sleek design.

name: iHospital
desc: Everyone’s phone stops working once in a while, but you have nothing to worry about, because iHospital is here for you! Established in 2003, iHospital provides top quality repair services for smartphones. The professional services and expertise of the staff here will ensure that your mobile is returned to you in fine working order quickly and efficiently.

name: Jang Won Korea BBQ
desc: Jang Won Korean BBQ is the go-to place for an authentic Korean barbeque experience! Grill premium cuts of meat at the table and watch as the tender meat sizzle to perfection right in front of your eyes. Revel in the delicious flavours of smoky chargrilled meat wrapped in a ssam paired with traditional Korean side dishes. Awaken your tastebuds with some spicy kimchi jjigae, mix a flavourful bowl of bibimbap, and have a shot or two of soju! Lastly, gather your friends, family, and everyone you love to share this authentic Korean dining experience!

name: Johnson Fitness
desc: Johnson Fitness helps you stay on top of your fitness goals. You could be a beginner or a seasoned gym-goer; there is something here for everyone at any level. Each quality, innovative product is designed to help you maximise every workout session. If you are looking to work on cardio, strength and conditioning, or want a full body stretch––Johnson Fitness has the equipment for you.

name: King Koil
desc: Investing in high-quality bedding is not something you should sleep on! King Koil makes the job a breeze by offering a wide range of sleeping products. Take your pick on mattresses made from various materials, as well as different bed types, pillows and accessories. All that’s left for you to do is to lie back and enjoy a good night’s sleep!

name: Lash Up
desc: Lash Up – Where Beauty Begins. Discover expert eyelash extensions, lash lifts, waxing, laser hair removal and eyebrow embroidery all in one place. Step into our chic studio and walk out feeling confident, refreshed, and effortlessly beautiful.

name: Lucky Gems
desc: Come here if you want a decorative item that also boosts the Feng Shui of your space! You will find quality jade, crystal gemstones, pearls and more to adorn your home and yourself. Each piece is unique to itself, and has numerous properties such as love, luck, prosperity and overall wellbeing.

name: MH Clinic
desc: Start your hair regrowth and rejuvenation journey at MH Clinic! As the first LCP-certified hair clinic in Johor Bahru, MH Clinic offers a range of MOH-approved, science-backed treatments to help tackle hair loss concerns. Treatments and services include oral medication, topical solutions, injectables, and energy-based devices. Visit today to begin your personalised hair regrowth journey!

name: Mi
desc: Founded in 2010, Xiaomi has garnered a reputation for high-quality, affordable technology. Mi fans love the brand for its relevant hardware and software, as well as internet services and accessories that all carry hard-to-beat price tags! At the MI Store, you will be able to experience the whole range of Xiaomi products: smartphones, TV, fitness bands and other constantly-evolving tech accessories.

name: MORSE
desc: When it comes to smart home electronics, Morse has the essentials. Since its launch in 2018, Morse has been bringing forth innovative gadgets that blend form and function seamlessly. Explore the potential of smart living with their line of robot vacuums, cordless vacuums, and kitchen appliances. Live smarter with Morse.

name: Natura
desc: Sleep comes naturally at Natura, an eco-friendly brand that promotes healthy, comfortable sleep. Innovation and technology come together to create a range of palm oil memory foam pillows, mattresses, and bedding products for uninterrupted slumber. Best of all, Natura products are manufactured with environmental responsibility in mind––so everyone can sleep well and do their part for Mother Nature, too!

name: Niko Hair & Nail Gallery
desc: Have a look revamp in stylishly trendy cuts in eclectic industrial environment at Niko Hair & Nail Gallery. Cuts, highlights, dye, perms, curls - combined to give you the most modern look, with an edge. Not just interested in styles, Franco also takes care of the health of your scalp and hair through high-quality products. Searching for a look revamp? Head to Niko Hair & Nail Gallery now!

name: NITORI
desc: Adorn your home in both fun and cosy ways with Nitori! Nitori has a beautiful selection of home furniture and interior decorations, giving you the freedom to design your own unique space and lifestyle. Coordinate colours, shapes, and styles with Nitori’s products that are highly harmonious, and spark joy in you and your family.

name: OPPO
desc: OPPO is here to stay for the generation of tech users who love style and usability. Their trendsetting camera phones are meticulously crafted, assuring users with its elegant design and breakthrough technology in mobile photography. The experience doesn’t end there: with quality service and a fantastic user experience, OPPO will stop at nothing to deliver the best it has to offer. Step into the world of OPPO and experience the difference for yourself!

name: OSIM
desc: Bring well-being into your home with OSIM, a brand that inspires wellness through their massagers, air purifiers, and indoor fitness devices. Paired with excellent service and holistic health know-how, it’s no wonder people continue to turn to OSIM for all their indoor health spa needs!

name: Palo
desc: Prepare for a fun-filled experience at PALO, an entertainment center for the whole family. Parents will love the games for kids, while friends can spend countless hours hanging out and playing on the latest gaming machines on offer. If you’re feeling lucky, try out one of the nostalgic crane machines and you might win yourself a prize or two!

name: PC Image
desc: All your IT needs can be met right here at PC Image, one of the largest computer retail outlets in Malaysia. Their shelves are well stocked with the latest computer and laptop models for all lifestyles. You can also get compatible accessories and other gadgets such as webcams and hard drives too. If you need some advice, just ask their friendly staff who will be more than happy to assist you.

name: Popular
desc: Page-turners, writing instruments, techy gadgets all call Popular bookstore home. Your favourite one-stop bookstore carries fiction, nonfiction, school books and magazines in 3 different languages, amongst thousands of stationery, accessories and audio-visual offers. If you need gifting ideas, you’ll find plenty of notebook gift sets, collectibles and more to make any occasion special––plus beautiful wrapping paper to wrap it in! Make Popular bookstore your first shopping destination, just know it’s difficult to leave empty-handed!

name: Rosa Moda
desc: Say your vows in style with Rosa Moda, with their promise to redefine femininity in weddings. Their designer gowns tell a romantic tale of each bride and groom, and their collections are brought in from Milan, Seoul, and Hong Kong. Let your love story unfold with the intricately crafted gowns today!

name: Samsung
desc: Samsung, one of the world's largest electronics gadgets producer is currently here in Mid Valley Megamall! Catch the latest Samsung IT gadgets such as mobile phones, tablets, laptops and digital cameras all under one roof! Our friendly and warm team member are trained to help you select the perfect gadget for you!

name: Say Nails Services
desc: Pamper your nails at Say Nails, where your enjoyment is top priority. Packages are catered to suit any moment of relaxation, so you can come in for either a quick fix or a full-length spa treatment. Rest assured that you are in good hands, as skilful manicurists will finish your nails off with gorgeous nail art of your choice. Just sink into the plush couches and get ready for some quality relaxation at Say Nails.

name: Sea Horse
desc: Sleep tight with Sea Horse, a manufacturer of high-quality mattresses and pillows that everyone can afford. You may have preferences over your mattress, and Sea Horse delivers with high-density foams that offer various levels of firmness. Experience them all in the store, and you’ll quickly find one that will give you endless hours of blissful sleep.

name: SLUMBERLAND - United Kingdom 1919
desc: With the promise of “the most comfortable sleeping experience”, Slumberland brings you the best of bedding wonders. Long established in the art of sleeping well, the brand carries high quality mattresses with a classic British heritage. Years of experience is packed into each mattress or bedding product to ensure a good night’s rest. Best of all, you’re assured of first class after-sales service with every purchase!

name: SOGO
desc: SOGO first opened on 18 January 1994 in Kuala Lumpur and now spreading its wing to Johor Bahru.Known for bringing the best of Japanese hospitality and heritage to Malaysia, SOGO offers a pleasant and memorable shopping experience to its customers with wide array of merchandise assortment – from affordable must-haves to luxury items. Spread over 190,000 sq. ft., it serves as a social destination for shoppers seeking beauty, fashion, lifestyle, pampering, leisure and many more. There isn’t a better place to relax, catch up with friends, and experience an exciting new retail journey with us. Find out more details on store promotions on www.sogo.com.my

name: Style by Andy Chan
desc: Experienced in putting smiles on customers’ faces, get all styled up at Style by Andy Chan Hair Salon. A professional and multi-award winning hairstylist that gives you the most innovative and trendiest hairstyles in the hair industry while ensuring optimal hair and scalp health. Come get an instant style upgrade at one of the most chic hair salons in town !

name: Style Vision
desc: Find your latest gadget wants at Style Vision. This one-stop solution provides you with the latest IT products at prices you can’t refuse. Bringing computer and information technology to shoppers, Style Vision Concept Store is all about offering quality without compromising on customer service.

name: Taro Yuan
desc: Originating from Taiwan with over 200 stores, Taro Yuan has officially opened its first location in Malaysia! Indulge in authentic Taiwanese taro desserts made with ingredients sourced directly from Taiwan. Enjoy their signature handmade taro balls, red beans, sago, and chewy pearls, all perfectly paired with shaved ice drizzled with brown sugar, grass jelly, grass jelly ice, and a variety of hot desserts.

name: The Home+Care Shop
desc: Home+Care Shop has been committed to providing you the best of healthcare products at fair prices for almost 40 years. They stock quality products that include durable medical equipment, pain management, hypertension and diabetic care, daily living aids and many more. You will find numerous world renowned brands on their shelves, all chosen for their reliability and proven results. Above all, Home+Care Shop offers a solution for good health, personal safety and independence to those in need.

name: TMT Megastore by Thunder Match
desc: Find your latest gadget wants at TMT Megastore by Thunder Match, Malaysia’s largest IT chain store. This one-stop solution provides you with the latest IT products at prices you can’t refuse. Bringing computer and information technology to shoppers, Thunder Match Hypermarket Concept Store is all about offering quality without compromising on customer service. Aside from professional advice, you can also expect maintenance and repairing services here. Be sure to sign up for its loyalty programme where you’ll get to enjoy a host of benefits like free extended warranty, free three years technical support at any Thunder Match service centre, special promotions and much more.

name: Toys'R'Us
desc: Toys"R"Us Asia is the leading toy retailer in Asia, with a massive network of brick-and-mortar and online stores all across Asia. It aim to offer a truly unique experience for every age group, from toddlers to teenagers and even for those young at heart through its vast range of products. At Toys”R”Us find fun and joy for the whole family with high quality products such as bikes, scooters, toys, outdoor playthings and even certified education toys

name: UOB
desc: UOB Bank offers financial solutions to the people and businesses within and connecting with ASEAN. We create solutions tailored to your unique needs through data and relationship-led insights. Our comprehensive regional network and one-bank approach connects your business to new opportunities in ASEAN. We help businesses to advance responsibly and guide personal wealth to grow sustainably. We foster inclusiveness and environmental well-being for stronger societies. This is how we stay committed to forging a sustainable future for generations to come.

name: Vivid Concepts Gadget
desc: Malaysia’s fastest growing mobile operator, U Mobile, offers optimal mobile services to suit your needs. With a wide range of prepaid, postpaid and broadband plans, you will be connected anytime, anywhere! You can also get phone bundle plans, U Mobile’s latest offers and replace SIM cards here. Come and find out what’s in store for you!

name: Vivo American Pizza & Panini
desc: The Horrigans’ secret recipe. The freshest ingredients. And the truest passion. Vivo brings them all together, combining the best of both modern and traditional pizza baking practices to deliver perfection at every bake. 33% larger than typical pizzas and made from freshly prepared dough, get ready for a taste-tastic experience that’s crunchy on the outside, and chewy within!

name: Vivo Concept Store
desc: Vivo’s tech gadgets put great emphasis on what you want: amazing audio, effortless interface, and a constant pushing of technological barriers. You’ll be impressed by Vivo’s smooth-performing features and specifications, all housed in sleek, modern lines. If you’re on the lookout for innovative gadgets to match your lifestyle, Vivo is definitely for you!

name: Zen Oriental
desc:
Giving you an extensive wellness experience through Zen Oriental body therapy that focuses on five important senses. Allowing your mind and body to destress while strengthen your immunity in a calm environment.
A perfect relaxing place with various massage on the list, with optimum services through this combination, your need to rest during the time your body is reviving will be fulfilled.

name: 9months
desc: 9months is a brand with one goal in mind: to make every expecting woman’s new journey their most stylish one yet! There are plenty of choices in contemporary maternity and nursing apparel here, all designed with the modern mom in mind. Each piece is made so that women need not compromise their style as they go through the various stages of pregnancy. From work meetings to baby showers, there is a functional outfit for the chic mom-to-be here!

name: Al-Ikhsan Sport Plus
desc: Welcome to a sport lover’s paradise! Al-Ikhsan Sports, award winning sports retailer and one of the largest in Malaysia, progressively aims high to be THE largest sports retailer in SouthEast Asia in the near future. From footwear to accessories and international or national team jerseys to lifestyle pieces. Authorised dealer of all your favorite sports brands like Nike, Reebok, Adidas, Asics and Puma, at competitive prices direct from the manufacturers. You will find it all here, at THE sports destination store.

name: Bata
desc: Much endeared and known by all, Bata is a shoe brand with over a 100 years in the shoe-making business! Though many may know it for its school shoes, Bata also offers a wide collection of footwear to cater to families from all walks of life. From fashionable ladies heels to sophisticated men’s shoes, there is a perfect pair for everyone right here.

name: BEGA
desc: Since 1996, BEGA has crafted stylish, curve-flattering women’s wear with premium fabrics, precision cuts, and on-trend designs. Known for vibrant colors, luxurious textures, and elegant yet confident styles, BEGA offers high-quality fashion at accessible prices. A must-visit for the modern, fashion-loving woman.

name: Caring Pharmacy
desc: Established in 1994 by 5 pharmacists, who were course-mates in the School of Pharmacy, Universiti Sains Malaysia (USM), CARiNG is now a fast-growing pharmacy chain in Malaysia with outlets in various locations. With the motto “Caring is our profession” expect around-the-clock pharmacist consultations, free health screenings (selected) and high quality, competitively priced products.

name: City Chain
desc: To find out what’s ticking in the watch world, City Chain is the place to be! The friendly wristwear brand brings in trendy watch styles for men, women and kids. Not only are well-known watch brands represented here, accessories and other timepiece paraphernalia can also be found on sale here.

name: Clarins
desc: Fulfil your beauty needs at Clarins, a leading French luxury beauty brand. With over 60 years of expertise, the brand has developed a broad range of beauty products with your well-being, balance and happiness in mind. Your skin will be rejuvenated by innovative approaches to beauty, harnessing the power of plants and technology to produce results that are effective and timeless.

name: Clarks
desc: For shoes marked with the guarantee of comfort and style, look no further. Clarks has been in the footwear business for decades, and really has it all. Men, women, kids and infants – everyone finds a shoe they love at Clarks.

name: Clinique
desc: Back in 1968, Clinique launched their first dermatologist-developed skin care range and has been a pioneer in the field ever since. Thoughtful of harmful ingredients that could cause skin allergies and irritants, their products are clear from parabens, phthalates and fragrance. Expanding from skin care to makeup range, even made available for the gent, every product is evaluated through various testing procedures to ensure they meet the highest standards on product safety and efficacy. Learn more now and let your skin decide.

name: Comfort Sole
desc: Some would walk the extra mile to find the perfect footwear, but many journeys end right here at COMFORT SOLE! The global brand breaks tradition by emphasising comfort with every sandal and shoe produced. A pair will provide hours of effortless walking, standing or running, while its signature look has garnered a cult following for its casual flair. Look no further, because happy, healthy feet could be yours today.

name: CU
desc: Up for a visit to Korea but locally? CU definitely has it all — a one stop convenience store that offers imported items from Korean freshly cooked street food, tasty authentic beverages and snacks to their range of K-beauty products and local essentials. A great place where you can chill for a quick catch up session with your friends, enjoying bits of Korea.

name: CUIR
desc: Cuir Boutique carries bags for all occasions––literally! This retail chain has everything from travel luggages to backpacks; handbags and leather goods. All these are from some of the most popular brands around: Antler, Barry Smith, Victorinox and Corroco to name a few. Can’t find what you’re looking for? Speak to the staff for custom made items like leather sets, travel accessories and other premium gifts!

name: Di
desc: Stand out from the crowd in sophisticated styles! Di is a Malaysia-based fashion brand that combines simplicity with avant-garde fashion. Its in-house line, Di Edition, pushes fashion boundaries with its original designs and quality fabrics, while Di Curated highlights local designer collections that complement its vision. Di also offers custom tailoring and styling services, allowing you to refine your style and express your individuality through a harmonious blend of form, versatility, and everyday sophistication. Step into Di for a mix of styles, all in one space!

name: Dr Ko Dermaceutical
desc: Clients who go to Dr. Ko Dermaceutical swear by the efficacy of the skincare––and no wonder. With over 20 years of experience, Dr. Ko Dermaceutical skincare products utilize only the highest quality, medical-grade skincare ingredients. DR KO Dermaceutical has 4 ranges of skincare products, namely, Dermax Clinicare, Ko Dermacare, Three Series, and Ko Perfect.

name: ELLE
desc: A ELLE, style is about everything. From the way a woman lives, to where she travels, to her taste in music, art, food, cars and technology. No need to live in Paris to get the Parisian style! Be Chic & Effortless with ELLE ready-to-wear collection. #ParisianAnywhere

name: Empurau Restaurant 忘不了
desc: Empurau Restaurant serves some of the best seafood that will impress the seafood connoisseur in you! Brimming with retro nostalgia, this Chinese restaurant is famous for its traditional wok-fried style and has 40 years of experience in Chinese culinary. Indulge in their seafood menu offered at dinnertime and delight in their signature Hainanese chicken rice and other local delicacies on their daytime menu.

name: Everbest
desc: With over 30 years experience in the industry, Everbest has certainly left their footprint across Southeast Asia as a reputable shoe brand. Their range includes stylish options for both men and women, and covers styles for all occasions. Comfortable, long-lasting and impeccably well-made, every pair of Everbest is guaranteed to delight you for years to come!

name: FITFLOP
desc: Embrace comfort with every step in FitFlop footwear! FitFlop believes that wearing great shoes with the right ergonomics underfoot makes a world of difference. Brilliantly engineered with world-class biomechanics, each pair provides the support needed to move comfortably. Whether you’re looking for sandals, slippers, mules, or loafers, FitFlop has trendy styles and classic footwear for both men and women. Nurture your body from the ground up and experience your first (but never last) pair of FitFlop in-store!

name: G2000
desc: G2000 is the go-to for clean cuts and fabrics, perfect for every savvy executive. Versatile collections consist of well-made business attire for all day comfort and style. G2000 also emphasises on affordable, quality workwear, so that you can look your very best without breaking the bank!

name: Geb
desc: GEB is an artistic boutique that embodies striking, playful fabrics and styles. Their apparel complements all shapes and sizes, drawing out your individuality! Take a look at the casual wear, accessories and more guaranteed to make you stand out today.

name: Gio Fabrics
desc: Find whatever you need for tailor-made clothing at Gio Fabric, purveyors of fine apparel fabrics. With selections sourced from all over the world, there is variety enough for every outfit of your dreams! The range encompasses natural materials such as cotton and linen as well as quality synthetics like satin, chiffon and crepe. You can also find bridal lace, synthetic leather and scuba materials for more specialised projects! Not too interested in custom-made clothing? Not to worry, Gio Fabrics also offers a line of ready-to-wear apparel specially for the ladies!

name: Giordano
desc: Giordano is a go-to for casual apparel. The easygoing range fits easily into any modern family’s lifestyle. Often opting for simple designs, Giordano apparel is well made and uses quality materials so that every item becomes a wardrobe staple. The simple, timeless styles suit everyone from all walks of life, living up to Giordano’s iconic brand value- World Without Strangers.

name: Hat Attack
desc: Find a whimsical hat story at Hat Attack where you will not only find hats in various colours, shapes and designs, but functionality as well, such as for ceremonial reasons, social status, or as a fashion accessory. Find the hat of your choice from the different hats placed within ‘frames’ of different pattern, shapes and sizes to indicate the style of type of hats available here. Come here and find the perfect hat for you to ‘put your best hat forward!’

name: HI STYLE
desc: Vibrant, lively, trendy and youthful! HI STYLE brings to you fun-loving but down-to-earth apparels that will keep you looking youthful and fashionable, without being pretentious. Get excited over the hottest tones in ultra-stylish garments at the fastest fashion fast-track store. Expect to find a wide variety of choices from the most basic essential garments to fashion-forward items for both genders at super bargain prices.

name: KOI The
desc: Hailing from Taiwan, KOI THÉ embraces its origins by infusing its tea products with cultural perfection and impeccable quality. The refined taste of brewed tea has brought about a huge following, with customers lining up in throngs to taste it! The refreshing lineup of teas include traditional varieties of green and black tea. This is then mixed with fun toppings such as golden bubbles, grass jelly, and even aloe vera! Each sip has a fresh, delicate flavour with a soothing aftertaste––a perfect accompaniment to a day of shopping.

name: Laneige
desc: K-beauty hottest brand! LANEIGE maximizes the potential of energy from water with carefully selected range of natural ingredients to deliver the right solution for each skin concern. Because at Laneige, we know our water recipes hold the key to young and vitalized skin. Find trendy and fashionable range of skincare and cosmetics that make you “Sparkle My way” be your true self and be confident every day!

name: LEE
desc: Style every type of denim with Lee! From casual chic to rugged edge, every Lee denim is designed for movement. Backed by over 130 years of purposeful design and craftsmanship, Lee is an iconic American denim and casual apparel brand that constantly inspires. Unleash your inner fashionista with Lee’s elevated denim essentials!

name: Lovisa
desc: Inspired from street style and fashion runways, Lovisa cater the perfect accessory ranges for its audience. Keeping up with the latest trend, Lovisa is every woman one-stop fashion accessories destination; offering from jewellery, head wear to fashionable timepiece. Perfect as your day-to-day staple pieces to gifting your loved ones, Lovisa collections are definitely a must-have and irresistibly bedazzling!

name: M.A.C.
desc: Achieve that flawless glam look with MAC Cosmetics! The cult-favourite brand is beloved by professional make-up artists and make-up enthusiasts worldwide for its high-quality formulas, ultra-pigmented shades, and extremely smooth and blendable textures. Play with colours and express your creativity with its superstar eyeshadow palettes, best-selling lipsticks, longwearing foundations, and other beautifully formulated products! Devoted to creating beauty products that celebrate inclusivity and diversity, there’s always something in store for everyone at MAC Cosmetics.

name: Madam Kwan's
desc: Explore the rich, flavourful taste of Malaysian cuisine at Madam Kwan’s! Madam Kwan’s is a local favourite restaurant that dishes out uniquely created Malaysian delicacies inspired by the diverse cultures of Malaysia.
