From nasi lemak to assam laksa to sambal petai, these are just some of the delightful eats you will find here. Don’t forget to try their signature chicken satay, fruit rojak, and cendol for a complete, truly Malaysian meal.

name: Mamaway
desc: Leap into motherhood with confidence with Mamaway! This beloved maternity and nursing clothing brand allows mothers and mothers-to-be to look fabulous when carrying a baby. Stand out from the crowd in trendy, innovative, and comfortable clothing that can be used before, during, and after pregnancy!

name: Melvita
desc: Melvita is a leading French brand that specialises in organic skincare. Simplify your skincare regime with their large range of organically certified products. You’ll find a range for each skin type as well as personal hygiene products, all formulated to gently cleanse you without chemicals, fragrances, parabens, mineral oils and formaldehyde.

name: Montigo
desc: Get sipping with Montigo! Born from a simple desire to create fun and customisable drinkware, Montigo makes staying hydrated fun again! Featuring spill-proof, leak-proof, and double-walled vacuum insulation to keep your drinks at the right temperature for hours on end, its well-designed products let you enjoy your favourite drinks on the go. Add a touch of personal flair by curating every detail of your drinkware, from colour to type of cap to engraving your name or an icon! Express your artistic style on your drinkware with Montigo!

name: Mr D.I.Y Plus
desc: Anything you need for a better, brighter home can be found at MR.D.I.Y.! This local star is Malaysia’s largest home improvement chain, pleasing customers nationwide with their wide selection of products and motto: “Always Low Prices”. With 20,000 products ranging from homeware to autocare, gifts and toys, it is almost impossible to leave the store empty-handed!

name: MST Golf
desc: MST GOLF is the leading golf service provider in Malaysia and beyond. With over 30 stores spread across South-East Asia, it's currently the largest and preferred golf retailer in this region. It offers the most comprehensive range of integrated golf services such as retail, wholesale, driving ranges, golf academies, corporate solutions and event management. With over 20 years in the golf retail industry, MST Golf definitely understands the needs of its customers better than most. True to its tagline “Everything Golf” find the widest selection of equipment, apparel and golf accessories. Step into MST Golf for the ultimate golf shopping destinations.

name: MUJI 無印良品
desc: A calm, serene oasis-at-home is complete with MUJI. Embracing a belief of “no-brand quality goods”, MUJI products create a zen-like atmosphere within any space. Extend a feeling of tranquility and functionality throughout your home with the kitchenware, furniture, stationery and foodstuff on offer. MUJI’s refined aesthetics even extend to your wardrobe, so expect to find apparel and footwear that will make you feel right at home!

name: Naelofar Concept Store
desc: Every modern woman will adore Naelofar Concept Store! What began as a humble online business is now a brick-and-mortar store where you can experience your favourite products before purchasing. The homegrown brand stocks a range of products such as instant shawls, cosmetic contact lenses, perfumes and many more. This is also the place to be if you’re looking for Naelofar Hijab and Abaya or NeeLofa Lens and Perfume!

name: Neubodi
desc: Your answer to the perfect fit is here at Neubodi, a brand that strives for effortless body transformation through lingerie. Let the friendly shop assistants help you with a one-of-a-kind personalised fitting solution, then find the right size and cup for your body. You’ll feel comfort and confidence like nothing else with every purchase!

name: OBJET
desc: Step into a world of stylish home decors! At Objet, you will find a plethora of homely objects that allow you to transform your home into a luxurious and cosy sanctuary. From simple minimalist designs to bold opulent patterns, this home and lifestyle store is a treasury of items made for varying moods and aesthetics. No matter the style you are going for, Objet probably has what you are looking for.

name: OPTICAL 88
desc: OPTICAL 88 is your premier eye care specialist, offering high-quality services and products to suit your needs. Walk straight in and receive an eye inspection from a registered optometrist, before selecting a pair of frames that best suit you. With hundreds of styles from renowned brands, you will find yourself a perfect pair in no time! OPTICAL 88’s after-sales service programme ensures that your experience is a pleasant one from start to finish.

name: Optometris Anggun
desc: Exude elegance with eyewear from Optometris Anggun! Fitted with some of the classiest and trendiest eyewear collections, Optometris Anggun also provides professional vision examinations so that you have what it takes to see the world in all its splendour. Explore the unique Malay aesthetics with a touch of simplicity and consult an expert for all your eyewear needs!

name: OWNDAYS
desc: OWNDAYS has the latest in eyewear styles, specially for you! This leading brand from Japan brings in a wide range of frames: from minimal, functional styles to statement frames that will get heads turning. The frames come in set prices between RM198 - RM498 and will be ready to wear in just 20 minutes after purchase. Owning a new pair of glasses has never easier!

name: Pierre Cardin
desc: Find lingerie and intimates that are made from carefully studying the daily needs of Asian women. With years of industry experience in fashion, Pierre Cardin truly understands what makes each woman unique. Browse the collections fo the latest in colour trends, fabric and the latest in garment innovation at Pierre Cardin Lingerie.

name: Precision @ Seen
desc: Precision @ Seen brings you the best in luxury optical wear. The high-end retailer holds no compromise when it comes to customer service and providing distinctive eyewear. Find only brand names that have been brought in for their quality and avant-garde style. So if you’re in search of frames to stand out from the crowd, worry not, you’ve come to the right place.

name: Renoma
desc: Since 1963, RENOMA has dressed sophisticated men and women who know what they want! Comfort, style and versatility blend seamlessly into RENOMA’s range of apparel and accessories. With timeless designs and a commitment to quality, it’s no wonder that RENOMA continues to be a wardrobe staple to this day.

name: Sasa
desc: SaSa is a one-stop carnival for beauty products! With over 200 international beauty brands in-store, there is everything the heart could wish for and more. Find a wide range of cosmetics, skincare, bodycare and haircare here, and even a selection of home spa products for relaxing ‘me time’. Shop at SaSa today for quality, affordable beauty essentials.

name: SEOUL STREET
desc: Want an effortlessly chic K-pop look? Accessorise right with Agassy, a concept store that carries the trendiest fashion accessories from Korea! The shelves are a-glitter with high-quality, unique pieces that will quickly become wardrobe staples. Self-expression has never been so stylish!

name: SK Jewellery
desc: SK Jewellery believes that everyone deserves to shine, which is why they’ve built their brand around this concept, crafting timelessly beautiful jewellery. Capturing natural beauty, luxury and allure, the brand has made high-quality jewellery attainable for every modern woman. Their contemporary collections are versatile for all life’s celebrations, making each one a special occasion.

name: Skechers
desc: Skechers - the one-stop footwear solution for men, women and kids of all ages and for all activities. From performance-enhancing sneakers, to casual lifestyle footwear and the ever-popular GoWalk comfort walking shoes, Skechers is a global leader you can depend on for designing, developing and marketing high quality and wide-ranging footwear.

name: SOGO
desc: SOGO first opened on 18 January 1994 in Kuala Lumpur and now spreading its wing to Johor Bahru.Known for bringing the best of Japanese hospitality and heritage to Malaysia, SOGO offers a pleasant and memorable shopping experience to its customers with wide array of merchandise assortment – from affordable must-haves to luxury items. Spread over 190,000 sq. ft., it serves as a social destination for shoppers seeking beauty, fashion, lifestyle, pampering, leisure and many more. There isn’t a better place to relax, catch up with friends, and experience an exciting new retail journey with us. Find out more details on store promotions on www.sogo.com.my

name: Sorella
desc: Holding on to the belief that every woman treasures femininity through body loving, Sorella aspire to enhance your natural curve with their range of meticulously designed and high quality lingerie. Focusing further on designing lingerie that supports and shapes better, Sorella unearth the feminine side of you with their numerous picks on materials. Best time to discover your body and its natural beauty with Sorella premium lingerie collection.

name: Sports Direct
desc: Not just your ordinary sporting goods shop, you can also find a wide variety of lifestyle, fashion and hobby paraphernalias right here. Carrying over 70 leading global sports designer brands such as Nike, Adidas, Under Armour, Puma, as well other well-known brands like Asics, New Balance, Skechers, Fila, Hi-Te, Karrimor, Slazenger, Everlast, Lonsdale and USA Pro, its no wonder Sports Direct is now UK’s largest sporting retailer!

name: SUB
desc: A brand made for the night owl and partygoer, SUB has been a long time go-to for the clubbing community! They pride themselves in designing and manufacturing quality apparel for the fashion conscious: from tops to trousers, skirts to dresses, there is something for those who want to stand out in the club. The in-house design studio and manufacturing facilities mean SUB apparel can achieve the highest quality both in looks and material. Come on in and find your perfect outfit, then get the party started!

name: TGI Fridays
desc: TGI Fridays brings you a feast like no other! Come and try famous, freshly made American recipes made to order. Whether you’re hungry for burgers, appetisers, sharing platters or more, it’s a great space for parties or a relaxing dinner. You can also enjoy the fun and friendly services, filled with people who’d like to make your day. Stop by at TGI Fridays for a distinctively different experience you’re sure to love!

name: TOMAZ
desc: Invest in a pair of leather shoes without breaking the bank at Tomaz. This brand strives to eliminate high markups on leather goods, thus providing quality footwear with the lowest price possible. Shop for all things leather here: dress shoes, watches, bags and leather care are available under one roof.

name: Trapo
desc: Protect your car floors from dirt and grime with Trapo! Trapo offers a fully tailored car mat solutions and automotive accessories for your car. This covers more than 400 car models across a wide range of brands. You no longer have to deal with car mats that don’t fit, or constantly slide around your feet. In fact, you can even order your car mat online, and pick them up in-store where Trapo offers free vacuum and mat installation.

name: Travel For All
desc: Choose the best way to travel in class and full functionality. Choose Travel For All. An established retailer that specializes in providing you with hassle-free travels with bags, luggages, winter wear and all you can think of accessories. Home to many international brands like Camel Active, Austin Reed, Legend Walker, President, Elle and more, get all your needs here at the hottest deals.

name: Triumph
desc: Living out the dream #TogetherWeTriumph - Triumph, one of the world’s leading lingerie and underwear company with an inspiring global success story. It develops, produces and sells underwear, lingerie, sleepwear and swimwear, fusing exceptional quality in workmanship, unrivalled fit and the latest in fashionable design. From seduction to sports and infusing super-soft comfort and seamless style, Triumph sure to have the perfect fit bra for you.

name: Universal Traveller
desc:
Universal Traveller believes that travel can be light, functional, and stylish. As your best companion throughout your travels, Universal Traveller specializes in winter wear clothing, luggage, and travel accessories, making it your one-stop center for all travel essentials.

Universal Traveller explores innovative ideas and products to cater to the evolving needs of the modern traveler while ensuring optimal functionality in winter wear for all occasions—from leisure to work—to 𝐊𝐞𝐞𝐩 𝐔 𝐖𝐚𝐫𝐦.

name: USC
desc: Encounter a whole new shopping experience at USC by Sports Direct where you can find the latest street styles alongside practical sportswear! Maintain an active lifestyle and look fashionable all at the same time. Browse the latest collections from international fan-favourite sports brands such as Puma, New Balance, Fila, Converse, Vans, New Era, Champion, and Asics, all under one roof.

name: VOIR Gallery
desc: VOIR Gallery is a one-stop fashion house that offers a complete range of trendy clothing for the whole family! You’ll find eight notable brands here: VOIR, VOIR Accessories, SODA, SODA Kids, South China Sea, Applemints, G&H and Diadora- all catered to different aspects of your lifestyle. Shop here and you will find quality, stylish apparel to keep you on trend no matter the occasion.

name: WACOAL
desc: Wacoal is all about comfort, form and function for women. Here, you will find a broad range of undergarments and lingerie that will accentuate your curves and boost your confidence. Browse the range of feminine bras, panties and corsets, or consult a Beauty Advisor in-store to find the perfect fit.

name: Young Hearts
desc: Young Hearts welcomes girls and young women to a world where lingerie is comfortable and fun! The undergarments here are all about soft textures, relaxed styles and lighthearted designs. It is the perfect wear for those who want to enjoy all-day comfort no matter the outfit. Apart from bras, panties and camisoles, Young Hearts also offers casual and sleepwear with a cute, feminine touch.

name: Zeiss Vision Center
desc: ZEISS Vision Center, your 21st Century Eyecare solutions, creating a whole new shopping experience for consumers, from frame selection and precise vision measurement to personalize lens consultation, and finally getting the consumers a pair of spectacles that fits their needs. The high-quality consulting support, the use of the latest optometric technologies and brand quality of ZEISS precision lenses bring you an ultimate vision care solution. With us, you will find the right One-stop Eyecare Experience.

name: 樂天皇朝 Paradise Dynasty / 美滋锅 Beauty In The Pot
desc:
Beauty In The Pot serves up a health and beauty hotpot experience! Savour six nourishing soup bases, all steaming hot, that are rich in flavour and highly nutritious. Coupled with the sumptuous menu of fresh ingredients and homemade specialties, Beauty In The Pot promises a delightful hotpot experience you’d want to share with everyone you love. 


Paradise Dynasty brings you on a gastronomic journey through dynasties of China! Encounter northern and southern Chinese cuisine across generations and savour its exquisite flavours, indulging in the luxuries of the imperial culture. The world’s first 8 flavoured xiao long bao are a must-try, with flavours such as foie gras, truffle, cheese, crab roe, garlic, Korean kimchi, Szechuan, and of course, its signature classic flavour.
logoUrl: https://www.midvalleysouthkey.com/img/tenant/Beauty in the pot & Paradise Dysnasty Mobile16Jun2025110741.jpg

name: Antipodean
desc: Antipodean is the perfect place to socialise and catch up with friends, family, and loved ones over a cup of coffee or two. Reminisce of the laid-back cafe culture in Europe, Antipodean serves quality coffee that leaves even the fussiest of caffeine lovers in awe. Gather here to experience exceptional brews and a good plate of tucker.

name: Baskin Robbins
desc: A dash of creative ingenuity and tons of fun infused with an unrivalled collection of ice cream flavors made Baskin-Robbins the world’s largest ice-cream chain shop! With new flavors introduced every month and a growing line of ice cream cakes to ice cream sundaes and beverages, just makes this the perfect place for all ice cream enthusiasts. So come join us for a tasty thrilling ice cream experience!

name: Bath & Body Works
desc: It’s all about making fragrance fun here at Bath & Body Works! Prepare to step into a cloud of fragrance as you wander through aisles and aisles of body lotions, shower gels, fine fragrance mists, and eau de toilettes that will soothe and pamper you. Too many options to choose from? Don’t fret,Bath & Body Works’ friendly and knowledgeable store associates will be more than happy to find you something that you will fall head over heels for.

name: Bespoke Premium Centre
desc: Get a fresh new perspective at Bespoke Premium Centre, an eye care centre with real vision! It’s the first in Malaysia to provide customisable, innovative products and comprehensive eye care services all in one place. Everything needed for bright, healthy eyes can be found here: from experienced optometrists, friendly assistants, and state-of-the-art vision testing equipment! It’s a customised optical solution experience just for you, so be sure to check it out.

name: Bonia
desc: Inspired by Italian design for its intricate luxury leather goods, Bonia was founded in 1994 and has been a leading fashion retailer throughout Asia. Classy yet everlasting, Bonia carries product ranges from bags, footwear and other accessories. Not only catering to women and men products, Bonia has now another division on living range, providing various choices of premium collection on tableware and tech accessories.

name: Braun Buffel
desc: Established in 1887 by Johann Braun in Kim, Germany, Braun Büffel has gained its reputation over the last century as a designer and producer of top quality leather goods and accessories. Today, it is a premium brand known for exceptional workmanship, superior leather, classic elegance and contemporary appeal.

name: CARHARTT WIP
desc: Established in 1994 by Edwin Faeh, Carhartt Work In Progress (WIP) develops its own collections based on original Carhartt workwear. The brand combines authentic adaptations of these robust American archetypes, while engaging with the subcultures that have embraced it. This, in turn, has seen Carhartt WIP place itself in a new context and bring forth its own classics. Carhartt WIP opened its first store in London in 1997 and today operates over 80 brick and mortar locations worldwide. It also has its own skate team and music department, while supporting an array of artists and releasing various in-house publications. Since 2010, Carhartt WIP has worked with a number of like-minded collaborators, including A.P.C., Converse, Fragment Design, Junya Watanabe, Nike, Underground Resistance, and Motown.

name: Carlo Rino
desc: Known for its contemporary yet ageless styles in leather goods as well as dapper looking footwear, Carlo Rino offers subtle yet fashion-forward designs in every collection. With added product range of timepieces, perfumes, and scarves, Carlo Rino is set to bring the trendy individualist in you, under one roof. The brand has always held on to its visions of “Fun, Vibrant, Invigorating Identity”, a perfect place to shop style that suits you best — from elegant workwear accessories to your casual chic look.

name: Chanel
desc: The CHANEL BEAUTÉ Boutique is where you will meet the world of culture and creations of the House. Step inside a constantly evolving boutique and find a comprehensive range of CHANEL fragrance, makeup and skincare. You will also discover the mesmerising Les Exclusifs de Chanel fragrance collection: a range of scents that evokes the story of Gabrielle Chanel and reflects the life and character of Mademoiselle.

name: Charles & Keith
desc: CHARLES & KEITH empowers women the world over through fashion. With modern footwear and accessories, each collection allows women to freely express themselves. Everyone can find shoes for every power walk imaginable here: stylish sneakers, hot stilettos, sexy sandals and everything else in between. Pair that with a matching bag and accessories- it’s no doubt that CHARLES & KEITH completes your outfit to perfection.

name: Chi-Gui Mala Hot Pot
desc: Chi-Gui mala Hotpot is the place to be for the most richly flavored spicy and herbal chicken broth hot pot. Offering two types of soup per hot pot with a wide range of ingredients and condiments that include premium wagyu beef and kurobuta pork, be sure you are in for a treat. Throw in some ultra-spicy, ultra-juicy barbecue lamb skewers and your trip to yummy paradise is complete.

name: Christy Ng Shoes
desc: Shoe lovers will find it hard to walk past Christy Ng Shoes and not stop to browse! A homegrown brand, you’ll find unique, well-crafted shoes to fit all occasions: comfy mules for daily errands to spectacular heels perfect for galas and weddings. If you somehow can’t find what you’re looking for, Christy Ng even offers a 3D Shoe Design platform for you to create your dream pair of heels! What are you waiting for- head over to the boutique today.

name: Coach
desc:
Coach is a global design house of modern luxury leather goods, ready-to-wear, footwear, fragrance, eyewear & a full range of lifestyle accessories. Founded in 1941, Coach has a longstanding reputation built on quality craftsmanship and is defined by its confident New York style. The brand approaches design with a modern vision, reimagining luxury for today with an authenticity and innovation that is uniquely Coach.

Coach Mid Valley Southkey Mall store showcases the brand’s keen focus on heritage and craft, equipped with a Craftsmanship Bar offering leather care, cleaning and Coach Create* services.





*Coming Soon

name: Cotton On
desc: Cotton On is a lively fashion label that delivers trends of the moment with a twist! The store is full of quirky, stylish apparel that covers womenswear, menswear, kidswear and accessories. Not only is Cotton On one to set trends, the brand is also a firm supporter of diversity, empowering people to express their styles through fashion! With fun finds and the freedom to dress up, it’s no wonder shopaholics make Cotton On their first stop at every shopping trip.

name: Diamond & Platinum
desc:
Diamond & Platinum is a haven for romantics and jewellery lovers. Their range consists of pieces crafted of the highest quality gems and materials, celebrating precious moment in love. Asides from their in-house brand Estrella Diamond, they are also an exclusive licensee of
Forevermark diamonds — elevating their jewellery to new, beautiful heights.

name: Dior
desc: Discover the bold and imaginative world of Christian Dior at this exclusive beauty boutique. Dior offers a unique olfactory experience through their wide range of fragrances, trendy makeup and exclusive skincare collections. Explore your beauty potential through bespoke services by their skilled consultants, gain access to exceptional beauty events and much more. The new boutique is the ultimate destination for beauty lovers.

name: dipndip
desc: Every self-confessed chocoholic must visit dipndip––a café that prides itself in serving chocolate sweets and desserts! Using only high-quality Belgian chocolate, each delectable concoction exudes a deep aroma and rich flavour. Choose from a wide array of treats: from crêpes to waffles to traditional hot chocolate in white, milk or dark chocolate. No matter the choice, it’s bound to satisfy anyone’s craving for chocolate!

name: Dyson
desc: The pioneer of cord-free, bagless vacuum cleaners, Dyson has since expanded its product line to bring you home solutions with the same drive for efficiency and style. The experts at Dyson are constantly researching user interaction to develop products that are revolutionary in performance and use. Asides from flagship vacuum cleaners, gadgets such as purifying fans, hair care machines and dryers aimed to simplify your daily lifestyle. A team is always available in store to assist you with your purchase, and a stylist by appointment to experience the full prowess of the Dyson beauty technology!

name: ECCO
desc: ECCO is one of the world’s leading premium shoe brands, combining style and comfort. ECCO’s success is built on products with a great fit and top-quality leathers. ECCO is a highly responsible company that owns and manages every aspect of the value chain from leather and shoe manufacturing to wholesale and retail activities. Founded in Denmark in 1963, ECCO is family-owned, that holds on to the foundation of seeking innovation as part of brand improvement as well as portraying new standards in their collection.

name: EICHITOO
desc: Make the city your runway with EICHITOO! Blending cultural aesthetics with modern styles, EICHITOO presents standout fashion pieces that are unlike any other. Discover clean lines and trendy silhouettes tailored for every occasion, from the office to casual days out in the city. With EICHITOO’s stylish pieces, every modern woman can achieve a polished look effortlessly.

name: Elemis
desc: Indulge your skin with the most luxurious skin care ritual! ELEMIS is a global British skincare brand with over 30 years of expertise that is passionate about taking care of your skin. With an aromatherapist’s soul, an artist’s spirit, and a scientist’s commitment to results, ELEMIS infuses soothing scents and feel-good textures into its revolutionary skincare formulas, creating award-winning skin care products you can’t help but love. Treat yourself to moments of luxury both day and night with ELEMIS!

name: Fila
desc: Founded in 1911 in Biella, a small Italian town near the Alps, the FILA brothers established a knitwear and underwear company, taking advantage of the town’s rich resources. Over the years, the brand expanded by incorporating Italy’s distinct artistic color sense into its clothing, laying the foundation for what FILA is today.

name: Focus Point Concept Store
desc: Focus Point Concept Store is unlike any other Focus Point outlet, as it is designed with you and your needs in mind. You can walk right in and try on any eyewear you fancy, then have them prepared for you right away! Their one-stop solution offers you a quick and easy way to make a new pair of glasses.

name: Giorgio Armani Beauty
desc: Giorgio Armani is renowned for its unparalleled elegance, and for almost 2 decades its beauty line has been enhancing the natural beauty in all of us rather than keeping it hidden behind a mask. The collection of couture cosmetics are completely in line with the world Armani strives to create; one that celebrates beauty from within, with the opportunity to reveal an individual’s true personality. This approach has culminated in makeup, skincare and fragrances that are rich in texture and inspired by nature.

name: HLA
desc: HLA is a menswear brand catered to the hip, stylish urban male. Here at HLA, you will shop the most stylish outfits to stand out at every occasion. The brand strives to offer the best quality at affordable prices, so that you can continue to look your best without breaking the bank.

name: Hour & Minutes
desc: Discover classic and modern timepieces at Hour & Minutes – a multi-brand watch retailer that specialises in SEIKO watches. Carrying the full collection of SEIKO timepieces (think Prospex, Presage, Astron, King Seiko, Seiko 5 Sports, Lukia, and Seiko Premier), this watch retailer is happy to help enthusiasts grow their collections or find the perfect watch for everyday wear.

name: iORA
desc: iORA hails from sunny Singapore and brings you workwear styles that are smart and versatile! The fashion-forward clothing range covers all your essentials: blouses, trousers, skirts, dresses, knitwear and outerwear. With silhouettes that drape and flatter, you will feel all-day comfort while maintaining all-day style. Shop here today, because iORA is all you need to look like the accomplished, confident urbanite that you are!

name: JD Sports
desc: It’s all about the latest and greatest footwear for you at JD Sports. The British sneaker chain has been in operation for well over 30 years, bringing in the best sports and casual wear from all seasons. You’ll find brands like adidas, Nike, New Balance and Vans here, and even own-brands labels like Pink Soda and Supply & Demand. Pleasing both streetwear fans and sneakerheads alike, it’s no surprise that they are known as the Undisputed King of Trainers.

name: Jo Malone London
desc: Fragrance is a personal statement. Imagine creating one of your own. Discover Fragrance Combining.™ Jo Malone™ scents can be worn solo or layered for truly individual effects. Freshen a rich floral with a citrus zing. Add spice for a warm allure. Create something unexpected. A long-time signature. Each fragrance is crafted from the highest quality ingredients by master perfumers. Tailor made, exquisitely simple, refined. And always with a touch of the unexpected, a characteristic of every Jo Malone™ creation.

name: Kiehl's
desc: Founded as an old-world apothecary in New York’s East Village, Kiehl’s is a family-founded store with a long heritage. All the skin and haircare products here are formulated from generations-old cosmetic, pharmaceutical, herbal and medicinal knowledge. With all this dedication, it’s no wonder every customer leaves Kiehl’s smiling!

name: Lapisan Patisserie
desc: Lapisan Pâtisserie, where the timeless artistry of French pastry traditions harmoniously blends with the vibrant flavours of Malaysia, crafting an exquisite fusion of local tastes and foreign techniques into every delightful creation. At Lapisan, each bite celebrates the art of lamination with 12 delicate, flaky layers that perfectly blends butter and dough, creating a unique pastry experience that tantalises your taste buds and fills the air with an irresistible aroma. Beyond this flaky perfection, we proudly showcase local craftsmanship through a selection of sweet and savoury delights, all offered at an accessible price for everyone to enjoy. Welcome to Lapisan Pâtisserie - where every layer tells a story.

name: LEGO
desc: The latest LEGO playsets and accessories could be yours when you visit the first LEGO Certified Store in Johor! There’s a playset for everyone, from starter kits for children to advanced playsets for master builders of LEGO. You’ll be able to build skyscrapers, futuristic vehicles, and so much more. There’s no end to the creativity you can unleash with LEGO!

name: L'Occitane En Provence
desc: It all began in the markets of Provence. With nothing but an alembic, a small truck and a solid knowledge of plants, our founder, a 23-year-old named Olivier Baussan began distilling rosemary essential oil to sell locally. He expanded his production from oils to soaps to creams, taking inspiration from the land he grew up on to bring natural beauty to homes across the world.

name: Love & Co
desc: Love & Co is a premier wedding jeweller that designs with ‘happily ever after’ in mind. Thoughtful, timeless, bespoke jewellery are their forte—creating engagement rings and wedding bands that not only celebrate a couple’s union, but are also priceless keepsakes. Couples who want a one-of-a-kind ring will revel in the personalisation and customisation services provided here.

name: Machines
desc: Your Apple needs will be satisfied right here at Machines, where you can find the full range of Apple devices and accessories! Demo units are available for all the latest products, so you can experience each one before making a purchase. You will also find accessories such as speakers, phone and laptop cases, bags and more here- all of which will complement your latest Apple product!

name: Maison Berger Paris
desc: Since its invention more than a century ago by Maurice Berger, Maison Berger is dedicated to purifying indoor air to provide you with a comfortable and pleasant living environment with its luxurious home fragrances. Its wide range of products are highly sought after, making them collectors’ items through the years. Indulge in the finest of fragrances created exclusively for Maison Berger by master perfumers from France.

name: Mango
desc: Inspired by the breezy shores of the Mediterranean, MANGO is every trendsetter’s go-to for chic, relaxed, and effortlessly stylish outfits. Best known for its flattering, modern silhouettes that match the urban lifestyle, the iconic Spanish fashion brand lets the modern urbanite discover fashion-forward pieces that truly resonate. Explore its vibrant collection of clothing, accessories, and footwear for women, men, and children in-store!

name: Michael Kors
desc: Cutting edge style takes centre-stage at Michael Kors, a celebrated designer amongst trendsetters and fashion personalities. His namesake company crafts luxury accessories and ready-to-wear collections for those who seek a distinctive touch of glamour. With the signature Michael Kors Collection and the MICHAEL Michael Kors labels, the brand showcases accessories, footwear, wearable technology, watches and fragrances that are coveted the world over.

name: MLB
desc: Forward trends and old classics meet and mingle at MLB, a Korean fashion label inspired by American Major League Baseball culture. The brand has made waves in the fashion scene with their monogrammed apparel, footwear and accessories. Their iconic look can be seen on stars, influencers and trendsetters alike. For the fashion forward, MLB truly is the place to pick up the latest must-haves.

name: MONOLOQ
desc: Express yourself through your personal style! MONOLOQ has fashion collections that allow the expression of self with pieces that embody classic elegance and distinctive styling. Whether you’re looking for versatile basics or statement pieces, its carefully curated and highly wearable collections are made to complement your modern lifestyle. Elevate your personal style with MONOLOQ!

name: Nespresso
desc: Experience the joy of tasting delicious brews every day with Nespresso! Nespresso elevates the coffee experience like no other with the touch of a button. With an exciting array of coffee flavours to choose from, each Nespresso capsule contains fresh coffee grounds sealed in laminated aluminium, preserving the highly coveted coffee aroma and rich flavour that are then extracted into a concentrated cup of dark elixir. Discover the Nespresso experience in stores today.

name: Onitsuka Tiger
desc: A true fusion of Japanese heritage and modern accents, Onitsuka Tiger has taken sports and urban culture style by storm! The legend lives on through its fusion footwear, updating classic silhouettes and creating completely new styles and collaborations with like-minded artists. No matter which path it takes, the brand continues to resonate with the spirit of Japan through each new collection.

name: Original Levi's Store
desc: Trendsetter, style-lover, everyday commuter––no matter who you are or what your style is, there is a pair of Levi’s® for you! The brand is the epitome of classic American style and effortless cool, moving forward from their historical roots into the modern world. Even today, Levi’s® continues to pioneer the denim world by creating jeanswear, tops and accessories for the world to enjoy and express themselves with!

name: OUTPOZT
desc: The latest Korean fashion concept store is lighting up the scene in Malaysia! OUTPOZT is designed to show off a whole range of Korean garment collections in an interior that’s sure to inspire your latest editorial shoot for Instagram. Come and strike a pose in a OUTPOZT’s inviting, modern minimalist interior that’s sure that be a Malaysia’s trendiest new lifestyle spot.

name: Padini Concept Store & Vincci
desc: It is rare to find a true shopper’s paradise, but one can be found here at Padini Concept Store. The multi-brand company has reinvented the way Malaysians shop, with multi-fashion brands for women, men and children housed in a massive contemporary space. A whirlwind of styles and trends can be found in the various labels, namely Padini, Seed, Vincci, Vincci Accessories, PDI, Padini Authentics, P&Co and Miki. Apparel and accessories on offer not only provide on-trend looks, but also quality at unbeatable prices. Shoppers who just want a quick fix particularly love the store, as displays are fuss-free for maximum browsing!

name: Pandora
desc: Loved by women the world over, Pandora designs and brings hand-finished, contemporary jewellery to life. Every piece is designed so that women can embrace and express their individual style, creating a personal jewellery journey that is uniquely theirs. The range extends from Pandora’s signature charms to necklaces, bracelets, earrings and rings! It is truly a place for women to self-express unforgettable moments, so start your journey today.

name: Parfums & Beauté
desc: Embark on new scented journeys with Parfums & Beauté! This unique and immersive retail experience welcomes all to explore and indulge the senses, as each month a new international brand takes centre stage – the likes of COACH, RABANNE, MONT BLANC, and many more. Its ever-changing backdrop sparks newfound intrigue as visitors take deep dives into each brand’s ethos, discovering and falling in love with their spellbinding curation of fragrances and scented products. Step into the world of luxury fragrances and perfume getaways, where each visit is ardently unforgettable.

name: PUMA
desc: Being one of the pioneers in the athletic wear industry, PUMA is known for the comfort in contemporary designs that instill innovative technology for their product range. As PUMA holds on to the values that bring the best in every sports professional from soccer boots to running pairs has now offers an expansion in fashionable sporty apparels and accessories. If you’re hitting the streets, their urban wear collection will be guaranteed to make a bold statement. Browse the diverse range today!

name: Regency Medical Care Centre
desc: Regency Medical Care Centre (RMCC) is a healthcare hub that is convenient and easily accessible, located right in the heart of the community. Brought to you by Regency Specialist Hospital of HMI Group, RMCC makes taking care of your health and well-being simple. From early detection through health screenings to enhanced health management, RMCC is able to provide swift diagnoses with the aid of a team of medical experts and advanced technology. RMCC blends high-quality services with accessibility and comfort, redefining the wellness journey and allowing you to receive the healthcare that you deserve. RMCC takes pride in offering a patient-centred approach, delivering comprehensive healthcare experiences for everyone and fostering the well-being of the entire community.

name: Royal Selangor
desc:
Founded in 1885, Royal Selangor is the world’s foremost name in quality pewter. From tableware,
drinkware, wine & bar to personal accessories, each piece combines a tradition of craftsmanship and
modern techniques.

Royal Selangor counts premier champagne houses Dom Pérignon, Krug, Veuve Clicquot, and major
global brands, amongst its clients for bespoke commissions, and its collections include works by
internationally renowned designers.

name: Samsonite
desc: Pack confidence into every single journey with Samsonite! From large suitcases to small travel bags, Samsonite has bags for every type of trip. Explore smooth, smart suitcases that are light, durable, and functional with TSA-approved locks for your next long journey, or pick out a sleek, stylish backpack for carrying your laptop and daily essentials. Samsonite also offers briefcases, crossbodies, totes, and duffels as well as accessories to personalise your everyday and travel bags.

name: Sans & Sans
desc: Ageless yet sleek with a touch of seasonal hues amongst its staple natural colours, Sans & Sans ready-to-wear collection offers contemporary designs with high quality hand-picked materials. Focusing on loose silhouettes with minimal cut twists in their design, every piece is meant to be worn with any shape, creating mindful collections for the wearer to pick from!

name: Sembonia
desc: SEMBONIA has been gracing the fashion industry for over 20 years with their timeless array of leather products. Their extensive collection covers shoes, bags and leather accessories coveted by fashionable men and women. What sets the brand apart is their eye for detail and versatility — no matter your outfit, SEMBONIA will complement it and give your look a polished, trendy finish.

name: Sephora
desc: Sephora lives by its philosophy to fully value beauty, driven by the demands of bold, excellence, energy, and freedom. It represents a contemporary concept that heightens the desire to live and dream about beauty every day, bringing an anthology of the world’s best brands to your fingertips. Known for discovering creative brands, highlighting trends, shaping aesthetic codes and administering tailor-made advice, Sephora is an experience that hits the target every time. It offers total freedom to walk-in, feel, dream, experiment and leave without feeling obliged to make a purchase. With its original products, avant-garde beauty services and innovative communication, Sephora celebrates audacity and truly breaks the mold when it comes to beauty retailing.

name: SHOPLOOOH
desc:
Be the cloud that give you comfort, be the sunshine that brighten your day.
 
SHOPLOOOH aims to bring quality fcasual wear that is simple yet fashionable for every lady expressing the classic of beauty from true soul, enjoying lifestyle with personal taste.
 
Wear it, Feel It.

name: Sime Darby Beyond Auto
desc: Unlock a brand new driving experience with the latest electric automobiles by BYD at Sime Darby Beyond Auto. This official authorised distributor of BYD in Malaysia introduces the brand’s best lineup of innovative vehicles with cutting-edge Blade Battery technology. Experience sleek rides and go on thrilling road trips with BYD’s ultra-safe, efficient, intelligent, and stylish electric automobiles. Test drive today.

name: SOGO
desc: SOGO first opened on 18 January 1994 in Kuala Lumpur and now spreading its wing to Johor Bahru.Known for bringing the best of Japanese hospitality and heritage to Malaysia, SOGO offers a pleasant and memorable shopping experience to its customers with wide array of merchandise assortment – from affordable must-haves to luxury items. Spread over 190,000 sq. ft., it serves as a social destination for shoppers seeking beauty, fashion, lifestyle, pampering, leisure and many more. There isn’t a better place to relax, catch up with friends, and experience an exciting new retail journey with us. Find out more details on store promotions on www.sogo.com.my

name: Starbucks Coffee
desc: Step into a whole new world of coffee at Starbucks Reserve, a place where boundaries are pushed and the art of coffee is cherished. Creativity is unleashed behind the counter onto each individually-roasted batch of coffee beans––brewing, aging, infusing and blending is used to create imaginative coffee creations. Nuances are enhanced, flavour profiles are sharpened, and coffee drinks are concocted like never before. It is a true haven for coffee lovers from all walks of life!

name: Swarovski
desc: Delivering a wonderlab of meticulously crafted jewellery & accessories, Swarovski brings artistry & elegance into the everyday lifestyle. Celebrate individuality & break the rules of style where innovation meets imagination.

name: Swatch
desc: Positive provocation and joie de vivre made in Switzerland: since its founding in 1983, Swatch has shaken up the watch industry. Thanks to its striking designs which always reflect the zeitgeist, Swatch is one of the leading watch manufacturers and the most sought-after brands in the world — and has always stayed true to itself. The watchmaker continues to surprise, whether with regularly released new models or special collections.

name: Swiss Watch
desc: Swiss Watch is a trusted and well-recognized luxury watch destination amongst watch enthusiasts, collectors and first-time watch buyers. Providing an extensive range of luxury watches such as Rolex, Bell & Ross, Breitling and Omega, our elegant boutique, enriched by professional expertise and exceptional service offers a comfortable environment to discover the perfect timepiece for you.

name: The Body Shop
desc: The Body Shop’s new Activist Makers’ Workshop store is a place for play and discovery! It’s known for their cruelty-free and 100% vegetarian ingredients skin range as well body butter and scrub, every skin to body product. Expanded in make up and fragrances too, the brand keeps to their belief that “everyone is beautiful”. Find out more on this new concept store today!

name: The Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf
desc: The Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf has been spreading their passion for the perfect cuppa since 1963. Seat yourself at a comfortable table, and choose from any number of carefully handcrafted products made from the freshest ingredients. The Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf is home to The Original Ice Blended® drink, but don’t stop there! Try the rich-roast coffee, fine teas and delicious pastries on offer as well. No matter your choice, you’ll be able to taste quality and perfection in every sip and nibble.

name: Tokyo Secret
desc: Famed Hanjuku cheese tarts, sumptuous exciting fusion dishes and sinfully delicious desserts, all in a contemporary relaxed surrounding. If you are game for these head for Tokyo Secret fusion cafe now ! Using only natural and air-flown ingredients from Japan in an extensively creative menu, be assured of an unforgettable dining experience.

name: Tomei
desc: Tomei captures every special moment in your life with perfect jewellery crafted from gold and diamonds. With over half a decade of proven expertise, Tomei offers fine diamond engagement rings, wedding rings, and other treasures you and your loved ones will cherish. If you need something truly special to mark a new chapter in your life, Tomei is the place to be.

name: Tonkatsu by Ma Maison
desc: Delight in the crispy perfection of deep-fried golden brown pork cutlet at Tonkatsu by Ma Maison! Hailing from Nagoya, Japan, Tonkatsu by Ma Maison serves up succulent tonkatsu perfected by avid food connoisseur and Chef Akinori Terazawa, using superior meat cuts and authentic culinary techniques. The result is tonkatsu so juicy and tender, you’ll come back for more! At Ma Maison, or ‘my home’ in French, it’s all about welcoming customers into a warm and comfortable restaurant to experience a selection of masterfully-made tonkatsu dishes.

name: TRT
desc: Expressive individuals know their wardrobe styling well. TRT offers a collection for the individualist in you as every piece is designed by an in-house team with sustainability in mind. Either you are styling separate pieces or one-piece, every TRT collection has that versatile functionality and timeless hues for you. Not only on apparels, TRT has an amazing collection of fashion accessories; from hats, scarves to bags, for you to pair up!

name: TSL | 謝瑞麟
desc: TSL Jewellery has put the sparkle into occasions with their trend-setting craftsmanship all over Asia. Find exquisitely designed jewellery in diamond and precious gems that are suited to many of life’s best moments. It will be a moment like no other with jewellery by TSL Jewellery.

name: Tudor
desc: TUDOR is an award-winning Swiss-made watch brand, offering mechanical watches with sophisticated style, proven reliability and unmatched value for money. The origins of TUDOR date back to 1926, when “The TUDOR” was first registered as a brand on behalf of the founder of Rolex, Hans Wilsdorf. He officially set up the Montres TUDOR SA company in 1946 to produce watches that respect the traditional Rolex philosophy of quality at a more affordable price point. Throughout their history, thanks to their robustness and affordability, TUDOR watches have been chosen by some of the boldest adventurers, on land, in the air, underwater and on ice. Today, the TUDOR collection includes iconic lines such as Black Bay, Pelagos, 1926 and Royal. Since 2015, TUDOR has also offered models with mechanical Manufacture Calibres with multiple functions and superior performance.

name: UNIQLO
desc: Uniqlo is a modern Japanese company that inspires the world to dress casually. It started in 1984 and has since grown to over 1,900 stores in 23 countries worldwide, including 48 physical and an online store in Malaysia. From T-shirts and sweaters to denim and outerwear, Uniqlo's clothes are highly versatile, made precise according to exacting Japanese standards for quality, and come in an astonishing variety of colours and styles.

name: Victoria's Secret
desc: Find the right scent for you at Victoria’s Secret Beauty. For every mood or occasion, choose from a fresh, bright, warm or dark scent available in fine fragrances, mists and lotions. Try our most glamorous fragrance, Bombshell Eau de Parfum! Treat yourself to self-care essentials, lip, travel accessories, bags & backpacks, keychains and more.

name: Xixili
desc: On the hunt for the perfect lingerie fit? You’ll find it at XIXILI, a homegrown lingerie label founded by ladies, for ladies! Pleasantly surprised by their improved bust-lines through the right brassiere choice, these ladies have perfected the art of lingerie through their exquisite collections and industry know-how. You will find beautifully made intimate wear here, and the professional in-house fitters will ensure that you find one perfect for your body shape.

name: Yves Saint Laurent
desc: From fashion comes beauty, and Yves Saint Laurent is taking it to greater heights! The Parisian couture brand now showcases a mesmerising array of luxury beauty products. Browse cosmetics in delightful shades and tints, breathe in the heady fragrance of signature scents, and be pampered by sensuous skincare. All this while creating a look that is truly, uniquely you. Your Own Rules? It’s here and now at Yves Saint Laurent.

name: A&W
desc: Come on in to A&W, a fast food chain home to the signature Root Beer Float! No one can resist the ice-cold root beer from tap with creamy vanilla ice cream on top. As you’re enjoying your beverage, order a warm Coney hotdog, burger or fried chicken platter to go with it. This casual, American-style dining experience is perfect for all ages, so round up the family and enjoy a get-together today.

name: APOLLO Pick-A-LiciOus
desc:
The APOLLO brand, founded in 1953, boasts a rich history and has grown from a modest local business into a leading name in the confectionery industry. Renowned for its exquisite chocolate confections and layer cakes, APOLLO's dedication to quality and innovation has fueled its expansion into international markets, establishing a strong global presence.

APOLLO is embracing a bold new chapter with APOLLO Pick-A-LiciOus, modernizing our brand to resonate with a new generation of snack enthusiasts.

Designed as an immersive brand experience, the kiosk invites consumers to taste, feel, and connect with APOLLO in a fresh, engaging way. It redefines snacking moments as indulgent escapes, bringing APOLLO closer to their hearts and hands

name: Auntie Anne's
desc: Shaped and baked to perfection at each outlet, Auntie Anne’s is a family favourite not to be missed. Each pretzel is warm, golden, and has a delightful chewy bite. Everyone will have their favourite flavour and choice of dip, but be sure to try sweet Cinnamon Sugar or tangy Sour Cream & Onion. Pretzels are perfect for any time of the day, so it’s no wonder there is always a line at Auntie Anne’s!

name: AWG Fine Watches
desc: AWG Fine Watches brings together beautiful timepieces under one roof. Expect to see renowned brands and timeless quality in all the watches here. The collection presented has been carefully selected, then paired with personality and warmth that can only find be found in a family-owned business.

name: B.O.D 包栈
desc: Founded by an enterprising duo in 2015, Bao On Demand has since turned into the largest bun and dim sum chain store in Johor Bahru! Having served its local clientele with delicious steamed buns and dim sum, it’s now here for you to experience as well. Choose from soft buns with fillings such as barbecue pork or red bean, then enjoy some siew mai, har gao and a myriad of other delectables! Everything on their menu is prepared fresh daily, so all you have to do is come over to Bao On Demand and enjoy.

name: Box Hunt
desc: Box Hunt is a niche retailer that has a special place in the hearts of collectors. They specialize in blind boxes—pick one and a limited edition collectible could be yours! Besides all sorts of blind box editions, Box Hunt also has vinyl toys and figurines for any fandom. Try getting a blind box or two, but be warned: it is addictive!

name: Brands Outlet
desc: Brands Outlet is an one-stop shop for the hottest fashion trends for all ages! The relaxed, sprawling space is home to racks of stylish apparel for men and women, boys and girls. You can shop for tops, trousers, dresses and accessories right here, all at affordable prices! It’s without a doubt that everyone outfits will look better than ever with a trip to Brands Outlet.

name: Chateraise
desc: Being popular locally in Japan with its 580 outlets while opening more than 90 outlets worldwide, Chateraise produces scrumptious desserts with its high quality, healthy ingredients in collaboration with Japanese farmers. Chateraise is known for its diversified cakes, chilled desserts, fruit jellies and selected chocolates amongst its customers. Chateraise also offers choices of gift boxes for you to share delicious mixtures of Japanese confectionery with your loved ones.

name: Din by Din Tai Fung
desc: Fun fact: did you know that Din Tai Fung began its culinary journey selling cooking oil in 1958? Market and consumption trend changes saw the company transform into the restaurant of the iconic Xiao Long Bao (Steamed Dumpling) in 1972. It has since garnered a Michelin star and is the only Asian restaurant on the World’s Top Ten Best Restaurants list by The New York Times. Diners flock here for the exceptionally fine dimsum and Shanghainese cuisine.

name: Dragon-i
desc: Dragon-i prides itself in serving mouthwatering Shanghainese cuisine, prepared by skilful chefs from Shanghai, Lanzhou and Hong Kong. Customers return often for the piping-hot Xiao Long Bao dumplings and springy La Mian noodles, of which they are best known for. Don’t miss the other menu items, however! All taste equally delicious, as the ingredients and condiments are brought in fresh for authenticity. Add this into the combination of warm service and lively environment, and you have yourself an unmatched culinary experience for a family feast!

name: Dubu Yo (Urban Korean Food)
desc: Indulge in the K-culture wave at DubuYo, where urban Korean food is served in a hip atmosphere! Best known for their signature Soondubu Jjigae (Spicy Tofu Stew), DubuYo also serves Korean delights such as Bibimbap (Korean Rice Bowl), Tteok-bokki (Rice Cake), and spicy chicken wings! Look out for their seasonal items as well, where unconventional flavours meld together in surprising new ways.

name: DUNKIN'
desc: Treat yourself to donuts and coffee at Dunkin’! Made fresh daily, this baked goods and coffee chain boasts a deliciously wide variety of donuts and great-tasting beverages that are simply irresistible. Satisfy your craving for something sweet and filling and pair it with delightfully smooth and bold Dunkin’ coffee. Don’t forget to try something from their seasonal donuts menu and, for the tea lovers, take a sip of Dunkin’s take on the local favourite teh tarik!

name: Eggette Lab
desc: Indulge in a little treat from Egggette Lab! Eggette Lab serves up Hong Kong’s no. 1 street snack – the Eggette waffle. Also known as Gei Dan Jai, this spherical egg-based waffle is chewy on the inside and crispy on the outside. Delight in the original sweet Eggette for that authentic Eggette flavour, or get the tricolour Eggette made of original, chocolate, and charcoal flavours!

name: Elianto Make Up
desc: Everyone deserves to look their best. If you love exploring different beauty looks and indulging in the latest innovative skincare, elianto’s treasure trove of affordable and quality products will present you with a whole new world of beautiful possibilities.

name: Empire Sushi
desc: Empire Sushi brings you the best of traditional Japanese sushi tailored to the local palate. The sushi here is loved by locals for its freshness and high-quality ingredients. To make the experience unique, Empire Sushi utilises local spices for their in-house sauce and explores a variety of culinary styles that delight! All your favourite sushi are prepared fresh daily with a grab-and-go concept in mind, so stop by and pick them up anytime you fancy.

name: Eu Yan Sang
desc: Eu Yan Sang is renowned in the Chinese medicinal market for its stock of fine quality Chinese herbs, Chinese Proprietary Medicines, health foods and supplements. The specialist stocks over 300 house brand products in-store, as well as over 1000 Chinese herbs and medicinal products from various ailments! Get all your TCM needs right here at Eu Yan Sang––you will not be disappointed.

name: Eureka Snack Bar
desc: Lowest of calories, unparalleled crunch; only in popcorn do we find that perfect munch—And when it comes to the fine art of popped corn, nobody does it like Eureka Snack Bar! Though it found a beginning in an unintentional moment of stumbled-into perfection (that made them go “Eureka!”), it is in their uncompromising emphasis on redefining what “Snack Time” meant as an experience, plus a genuine love for that life-changing bite that shines through undeniably in their every offering, that they find that special something which keeps them miles ahead of their competition...as the true Snack Time Masterminds.

name: F.O.S
desc: For all wardrobe staples, look no further than F.O.S. The retail chain is well established as a go-to for affordable, quality apparel. You’ll find styles for the whole family, from basic tees to business shirts, kiddy clothing and footwear. It’s everything you need and more, right here at F.O.S.

name: FamilyMart
desc: Experience a true masterpiece of Japanese urban culture: the konbini! FamilyMart is the epitome of convenience, providing all type of necessities to keep you going on a busy day. Pay your bills or send parcels right at the store. If you’re feeling hungry, there is a startling array of snacks and ready meals to choose from, all delivered daily for the ultimate freshness.

name: Famous Amos
desc: “Free Smell" from our Hot-baked store has been an irresistible aroma of our freshly baked cookies recognized by every true cookie lover anywhere. There are nine varieties of chocolate chip cookies, freshly baked throughout the day using the best ingredients, like semi-sweet chocolate chips and flavorful nuts. That is what made these homemade tasting cookies famous! At Famous Amos, we also have Soft & Chewy Cookies, Muffins, Brownies, Chocolate and other customizable gift hampers.

name: FIX Aquatics
desc: Dive into the aquatic world of aquariums, paludariums, and underwater ecosystems! FIX Aquatics is passionate about displaying the beauty of underwater life. Whether you’re into freshwater critters and aquatic flora or saltwater dwellers and cultured corals, they have top-notch equipment and expert advice to keep your tanks healthy and thriving. Make a trip to FIX Aquatics, where master aquarists and aquatic enthusiasts are welcome to enjoy their aqua-tastic hobby!

name: FIX IT ALL Auto Detailing
desc: Your car would look better than ever with FIX IT ALL Auto Detailing! It’s a one stop service that provides car washing, polishing and detailing. With more than 10 years experience in the industry, you can be sure that your car is in good hands. FIX IT ALL Auto Detailing also prides itself on assessing the service needs of customers and giving great solutions, rather than just providing a service. This keeps customers’ coming back and their cars clean and polished.

name: FIX IT ALL Auto Detailing (South)
desc: Your car would look better than ever with FIX IT ALL Auto Detailing! It’s a one stop service that provides car washing, polishing and detailing. With more than 10 years experience in the industry, you can be sure that your car is in good hands. FIX IT ALL Auto Detailing also prides itself on assessing the service needs of customers and giving great solutions, rather than just providing a service. This keeps customers’ coming back and their cars clean and polished.

name: Fix Shoe Spa
desc: Bring your sneakers back to life at Fix Shoe Spa! This professional shoe care service offers premium shoe laundry and restoration services, including Standard Wash, Detail Wash, and Midsole Unyellowing. Using gentle, effective methods to give your daily wear and prized collections a total refresh, your kicks will look almost as good as new! Drop off your favourite pair for a quick spa day today!

name: FUIYOH! It's UNCLE ROGER
desc: FUIYOH! it’s UNCLE ROGER serves up a fun dining experience of Asian cuisine, with a special spotlight on fried rice! Every plate of UNCLE ROGER-approved fried rice makes a great base for a little extra fuiyoh – we’re talking grilled unagi, satay daging, MSG Kale Chips, and the like! Even better, upgrade your meal to the next level with some YSoWeak Mala Popcorn Chicken and Mala Okra Fries to share with the table, then finish off with brain-freezing fruit slushies and creamy soft-serve ice cream. Before you leave, remember the UNCLE ROGER experience with a souvenir from the merchandise corner. Don’t wait anymore – come for the food, stay for the fun! FUIYOH!

name: Garmin
desc: Coming from a long history of innovative tech, Garmin now has an impressive range of wearable devices for any lifestyle! From marine or automotive to fitness and outdoor recreative, there is a Garmin device for you. Each smart watch, activity tracker, GPS device is beautifully designed and packed with cutting-edge features so that you can beat yesterday, every day.

name: Garrett Popcorn Shops
desc:
For over seven decades, Garrett Popcorn Shops has served gourmet popcorn using wholesome ingredients in their secret family recipes, passed down for generations. Custom grown, non-GMO butterfly and mushroom kernels are first hot-air popped in their kitchens, then enriched with flavor in seasoned, old-fashioned Copper Kettles. Because good things take time, Garrett Popcorn is handcrafted in small batches throughout the day.

Signature recipes include the fan-invented, original Chicago-style popcorn, Chicago Mix™, which blends the sweetness of CaramelCrisp™ with the savory goodness of CheeseCorn; plus Buttery (a vegan treat!), Plain, CheeseCorn, CaramelCrisp, Almond CaramelCrisp and Macadamia CaramelCrisp.

Like no other™, Garrett Popcorn enchants adoring fans around the world.

name: Good2U Concept Store
desc: Good2U is inspired by everyday comfort for all. Our extensive collection of comfortable, stylish, and affordable garments are designed to provide you with maximum value. Good2U is more than just clothing, it's an experience. Our focus on quality and versatility allows us to create long-lasting wardrobe staples that empowers you to express your own individual style with ease.

name: Guardian
desc: Guardian is a one-stop chain for everyone’s lifestyle needs, providing an extensive range of health, beauty and personal care products. The brand is well known for great quality and affordability, with household brands and well-loved products stocked on the many shelves here!

name: Habib
desc: For the finer things in life, drop by HABIB, Malaysia’s premier jeweller. Be dazzled by the beauty and intricate craftmanship in each and every piece of gold, diamond and coloured gemstone jewellery, ranging from trendy contemporary pieces to timeless classics.

name: Harvey Norman
desc: Appliances, gadgets, furnishing and so much more are available at Harvey Norman, an Australian superstore for your lifestyle needs. Home to some of the biggest brands in household and IT products, shopping is made easy with Harvey Norman’s selection of brands, competitive prices and superb after sales services. Come right in, and shop with confidence of quality and delivery right here.

name: Hazukido
desc: Hazukido brings to you the incredible taste of pastries that no one can resist! Treat yourself to the best croissant chain in all of Asia! Be the first to try out this French pastry made with a unique Japanese folding technique. Each croissant is made with premium ingredients around the world, making it a gastronomic event for all to enjoy.

name: Herbal Farmer
desc: A first of its kind, Herbal Farmer caters to Malaysian urbanites who see Chinese herbal alternatives. This modern herbal store offers high quality Chinese remedies in a friendly, self-service environment. The traditional envelope has truly been pushed, as proven by the clean environment full of eye-catching products!

name: Horti Plant
desc: Breathe life into any space with pieces of art crafted by nature! Horti Plant has beautifully assembled terrariums that can elevate any surface, gorgeous kokedamas that hang gracefully in the air, dragon fruit seedlings in cute pots, and magnificent preserved moss art that can transform any wall. This artistic plant store also offers terrarium workshops for beginners, ideal for those who want to try designing their own pocket garden. Explore a world of creativity rooted in nature here!

name: innisfree
desc: innisfree is a natural cosmetics brand that shares the benefits of nature from the pristine island of Jeju, allowing for vibrant beauty and pursues an Eco-friendly green life to preserve the balance of nature.

name: Juice Works
desc: Your favorite fruit factory is here! Get excited over 30 flavors of juices to choose from or get creative by coming up with your very own unique combination. Committed to creating hand-made fruit juices and smoothies from the freshest of ingredients that are carefully sourced, we are on a quest to satisfy your yearning for healthy and delicious eats anywhere, anyday.

name: Jungle House
desc: From hive to home! Jungle House delivers ethically sourced honey that’s bold in flavour, rich in nutrients, and naturally pure. By working hand-in-hand with native beekeepers, Jungle House helps protect the fragile ecosystem of honeybees — essential for sustainably harvesting 100% pure, natural, raw honey. Visit the Jungle House flagship store to discover more about nature’s greatest gift: honey.

name: Kedai Kopitiam Oriental Kopi
desc: Retaining that essential quality that defines NanYang cuisine, Oriental Kopi utilises traditional techniques to specially craft each and every one of its offerings, elevating its servings beyond comparison. Oriental NanYang Coffee, Portuguese Egg Tarts, Polo Buns, Traditional Toast, Signature Nasi Lemak and so much more. Excited? You should be… For the true wonders of the Orient are now yours to experience.

name: Kedai Kopitiam Oriental Kopi
desc: Retaining that essential quality that defines NanYang cuisine, Oriental Kopi utilises traditional techniques to specially craft each and every one of its offerings, elevating its servings beyond comparison. Oriental NanYang Coffee, Portuguese Egg Tarts, Polo Buns, Traditional Toast, Signature Nasi Lemak and so much more. Excited? You should be… For the true wonders of the Orient are now yours to experience.

name: KFC
desc: It’s hard to beat decades of memories and great food! Enjoy that and more at KFC, Malaysian’s go-to restaurant for ‘Finger Lickin’ Good’ moments. It all starts with chicken offerings of Original Recipe or Hot & Spicy, followed by innovative menu items, festive promos then topped with excellent service! At KFC, you’ll enjoy the best of Southern fried chicken that has developed a distinctive local personality––what could possibly be better?

name: KKV
desc: KKV offers a curated range of trendy lifestyle products, from snacks and beauty items to stationery and homeware. Known for its vibrant displays and unique finds, it provides a fun shopping experience for all ages. Perfect for quick treats or gifts, KKV is your go-to for everyday delights

name: Koong Woh Tong
desc: From its best-selling herbal jelly to traditional Chinese herbal teas, Koong Woh Tong’s line of herbal products is well-known for its remarkable healing properties. Experience in-store the soothing effects of a bowl of ‘Wu Hua Cha’ (五花茶) or ‘Ya Sei Mei’ (廿四味) and bring home its conscientious selection of traditional herbal teas to drink anytime.

name: Krispy Kreme
desc: Enjoy fresh, fluffy doughnuts from Krispy Kreme! Delivering joy since 1937, this world-famous doughnut franchise makes doughnuts so awesome, you’ll always come back for more. Its signature Original Glaze is a crowd-favourite classic that melts in your mouth with sweet sugary goodness and fluffy-as-clouds texture. Whether you’re looking for a midday pick-me-up or sharing the joy with friends, Krispy Kreme has treats that are both sweet and magical for everyone!

name: Kwan Kee Store
desc: Delight in traditional Chinese pastries from Kwan Kee Store! Every pastry is meticulously crafted using freshly milled rice that is made using time-honoured methods of grinding rice flour. By combining traditionally milled rice flour and age-old recipes, Kwan Kee Store preserves the authenticity and exceptional flavour of its traditional desserts. Enjoy the delicate texture of a Rice Bowl Cake, the nutty flavour of Steamed Black Sesame Layer Cake, the slightly tangy taste of White Sugar Cake, the gently sweet flavour of Steamed Red Bean Cake, and more!

name: KyoChon 1991
desc: With several awards under their belt, KyoChon 1991 certainly knows a thing or two about delicious South Korean fried chicken! Step into the restaurant for a fried chicken experience that showcases a wide spectrum of flavours, going far beyond the regular offerings. Choose from series such as Original, Red Pepper, Honey, Salsal and Rice––each accentuating the natural flavour of fried chicken. The relaxed environment is perfect for impromptu gatherings with family friends, so just get in line and enjoy the crunch!

name: LAC
desc: Welcome to the largest global specialty retailer of health food – your trusted source for nutritional and fitness supplements for over 75 years. LAC know what they’re talking about when it comes to quality products, standards, responsible labeling, ingredient safety and products that work. Their special in-house brand is manufactured in a facility that’s GMP-compliant, FDA-registered, TGA-certified (Australia) and completely state-of-the-art. Every product undergoes 150 quality and safety checks – even exceeding FDA and Malaysian regulations. That’s how far they’ll go in their commitment to quality – upon purchase and afterwards. At LAC, the qualified nutritionists and advisors want you to live your best life. So let them know what you’re looking for, and they’ll suggest some great supplements to give you a healthy edge.

name: Lavender
desc: Follow the scent of freshly baked bread, and it will arrive at Lavender! The bakery is filled with racks of warm pastries, breads and other baked treats, with more coming out of the ovens daily. For the sweet tooth, an array of fresh cream cakes and sticky desserts will surely delight. Having combined traditional techniques, modern technology and skilled bakers, Lavender has certainly found the secret ingredient to creating delicious treats the whole family can enjoy!

name: Lazo Diamond
desc: At Lazo Diamond “Owning a diamond is no longer a dream”. Modern, unique and contemporary designs delivered to you in the finest quality at the most affordable prices. No wonder Lazo Diamond is now Malaysia’s premier manufacturer and retailer of white gold and diamond jewellery. With not only excellent sales but also excellent after sales service, expect to be 100% satisfied.

name: Le Creuset
desc: Le Creuset has grown to offer products across a range of materials and categories, with a focus on "the right material for the right job." In addition to their colorful enameled cast iron cookware today's product offerings include their range of premium stoneware cookware and bakeware proudcts, high performance tri-ply stainless steel and forged hard anodized cookware lines, teakettles, stockpots, and tools and wine accessories.

name: llaollao
desc: If ice-cream isn’t really your thing, give llao llao a try! Part of the worldwide frozen yoghurt phenomenon, llao llao is a firm favourite for their refreshing, creamy frozen yoghurt. Choose your preferred yoghurt size––mini treat or an extra-large sharing cup––then combine it with a choice of fresh seasonal fruits, crunchy cereals and yummy sauces. It’s a healthy alternative to all-day treating, so head on over to llao llao for yours!

name: Mahnaz Food
desc: Mahnaz Food is all about healthy snacks and nutritious foodstuffs! With great fondness for yummy tidbits and nourishing food, Mahnaz Food is here to offer an assortment of delicious and nutritionally beneficial food products. Explore wholesome nibbles such as dates, dried fruits, nuts, and seeds, and find healthful ingredients like gum arabic, herbal extracts, oils, spices, all kinds of vinegar, and even fruit jams! Mahnaz Food imports most of its products from Islamic and Middle Eastern countries so come right in to discover some halal snacks!

name: Mak's Chee Authentic Wonton 麥氏西池港式雲吞麵
desc: Slurp up springy wonton noodles! Mak’s Chee Authentic Wonton dishes out fresh prawn wonton noodles using an age-old family recipe passed down for generations. Since its days as a small noodle stall in Guangzhou, China, in the 1920s, Mak’s Chee Authentic Wonton has attracted numerous patrons, including politicians, leaders, and celebrities. Come right in for a bowl of piping hot noodles and other dishes that are sure to delight!

name: Meng Meng Roasted Duck
desc: Meng Meng Roasted Duck has been delighting customers with their traditional roasted meat dishes for over 16 years. Their humble, homely recipes are an endless source of comfort, made even more unique as the meats are cooked using charcoal for an added smoky dimension. The restaurant is a pleasure to sit in with its modern oriental interior, while friendly wait staff ensure you are served the best of roasted duck and pork dishes!

name: Miniso
desc: Choose happiness every day! MINISO boasts trendy and creatively designed lifestyle products that are well-made, aesthetically pleasing, and extremely practical. Surround yourself with your favourite characters from exclusive brand partnerships, such as Harry Potter, Disney, Sanrio, Barbie, and Marvel. Not only that, you will find other functional, stylish, and sophisticated everyday goods at MINISO that bring joy to your everyday life. Visit MINISO today!

name: mothercare
desc: Mothercare is the world’s largest and most trusted retail specialist in newborn and parenting products. The founder of Mothercare, Selim Zilkha envisioned a one-stop- shop for the needs of mother and baby under one roof. This vision continues today in Mothercare shops that offer a premium shopping experience, with full range of specialized, high quality, safe and innovative products and services. Mothercare takes great pride in providing products and the people to manage that wonderful, frustrating, hilarious, serious, exhausting and rewarding process call parenting.

name: MyIPOH 怡保
desc: Delight in Ipoh’s culinary gems! MyIPOH 怡保 serves up authentic Ipoh specialties made with grandma-approved recipes, using fresh, quality ingredients. Savour the real flavours of Ipoh and enjoy great vibes with family and friends at MyIPOH 怡保!

name: myNews.com
desc: If you like snacking while you read, then myNews.com is what you’ll need for a quick fix! This convenience store stocks newspapers, magazines and even light novellas on one side, and yummy snacks and drinks on the other. Now everyone can enjoy the best of both worlds under one convenient roof

name: Nando's
desc: Nando’s is much loved for its flaming flavours and Portuguese inspired Peri-Peri sauces. You’ve never tasted anything like their juicy chicken, flame-grilled in house! Every item on their menu is packed with flavours that complement one another, served fresh in a vibrant atmosphere. It’s always a feast for your senses at Nando’s, so experience it today.

name: Nyeon Nails
desc: Slay your nail game all day, every day! Nyeon Nails has press-on nails for every occasion, from clean, nude tones to bold, intricate designs. Quick, easy, and reusable, Nyeon Studio press-on nails will have you looking put together effortlessly at the snap of your fingers. Switch up your style anytime, anywhere, with press-on nails that match every fit and every mood!

name: Ogawa
desc: In times of exhaustion and tiredness, OGAWA is always here for everyone! This health and wellness brand has been caring for countless busy lives with their innovative equipment and home wellness solutions. From massage chairs to footbaths, their award-winning products have one aim in mind: to bring you relaxation when you need it most.

name: OldTown White Coffee
desc: Enjoy the taste of deliciously authentic Malaysian Cuisine! OldTown White Coffee brings you the timeless Ipoh coffee shop ambience and classic “kopitiam” comfort food to their menu. Relax and enjoy signature meals like Ipoh Chicken Hor Fun, Prawn Meehoon Mee and Nasi Lemak. You can also have a taste of the aromatically delightful Old Town White Coffee for a truly satisfying meal.

name: ParaThai
desc: Satisfy your cravings for rich and aromatic Thai cuisine! ParaThai serves up authentic Thai dishes crafted by an expert culinary team of Thai chefs, using ancient recipes with a focus on flavours and freshness. Explore its elaborate menu and be spoiled for choice, ideal for a casual family dinner or gathering with friends!

name: Pho Vietz
desc: Delight in the aromatic and vibrant flavours of Vietnamese food! Pho Vietz serves up soul-satisfying Vietnamese food that is meticulously prepared, authentic in flavour, and made with fresh ingredients. Tease the palate with something light like Bánh Mì or Bánh Cuốn, then savour hearty meals like Phở and Bo Kho. Don’t forget to order a creamy and velvety cup of Vietnamese coffee while exploring the dessert menu. Visit Pho Vietz for an unforgettable culinary journey!

name: Pizza Hut
desc: If you’re at a loss on what to eat, bring your family and friends over to Pizza Hut! The much-loved pan pizza is always served hot, crisp and oh-so-cheesy, with mouthwatering toppings and seasonal options. You can also order delicious pastas and fun sides such as wings, wedges and bread twists. End your meal with a molten lava cake, and there you have it––another great experience only at Pizza Hut.

name: Poh Kong
desc: Founded in 1976, Poh Kong is now the largest jewellery retail chain in Malaysia. It offers a wide collection of gold ornaments, diamonds and gems which are lovingly crafted by its team of skilled craftsmen and designers.
