If you are looking for that very special piece for that very special someone, try our collection of Schoeffel luxury pearls from Germany, Luca Carati & Moraglione 1922 from Italy and many more exquisite jewelleries from around the world that is only available at Poh Kong.

name: Royce
desc: Royce’ brings you an authentic taste of Hokkaido with fine, artisanal chocolates that are loved by many. The beauty of Royce’ is in the rich, creamy texture of each chocolate square. This is accentuated by the carefully sourced ingredients from all over the world, ensuring maximum flavour with every bite. If you are in need for an excellent gift, consider getting a lovely box of Royce’ to make your occasion special!

name: S.D.S SINCE 1987 Bakery Café
desc: SDS Bakery is loved by locals for its delicious pastries and sweet goodies. With 27 outlets in Johor and counting, the bakery-cum-cafe is constantly living up to it’s Share, Dine, Smile. Enjoy a mouthwatering selection of pastries, breads, cakes and gelatos made fresh daily. They even do caterings for events, so be sure to ask the friendly staff for ideas on your next big party!

name: Season Silver Trading
desc: Inspired by the detailed couture and a mix of street styles, Season Silver focuses on creating the latest trend of jewellery pieces. Perfect to complete your day-to-night look with this must-have bling, you will be overindulged with choices. Implementing the core value of the brand, Season Silver offers impeccable customer service that holds on to “It’s about you, always”.

name: Secret Recipe
desc: Come together for good food, good company and good times at Secret Recipe Cakes & Café. Their much-loved fusion menu consists of award-winning dishes like Tom Yum Kung and Irish Lamb Shank, as well as favourites like Chicken Cordon Bleu, Spaghetti Meatballs and various Asian Wok Dishes. Of course, the spotlight remains on their fantastic array of cheese and cream cakes, guaranteed to send dessert lovers into seventh heaven!

name: Signature Market
desc: Embark on a healthy living journey with Signature Market! Whether you enjoy munching on healthy snacks like nuts, trail mixes, and dried fruits or have nutritious ready-to-eat meals, Signature Market has a range of carefully selected products dedicated to your well-being. Explore its ever-expanding wellness essentials, including snacks that are good for you to aromatherapy and skincare! Your wholesome lifestyle journey starts here with Signature Market and its sister brands:  Plant Origins, Yī, Two Tails, Bunny-U, and SingMaThai

name: Smiggle
desc: Where a smile meets a giggle, SMIGGLE is the ultimate creator of fun and quirky desk companions! Bursting with flashy stationery, funky office supplies, wacky school bags, fancy lunchboxes, and spiffy drink bottles, there’s always something special for everyone. Step into the flamboyant world of SMIGGLE, where playful surprises await on every shelf.

name: SMJ
desc: If you are looking for a currency exchange provider that is alwaysavailable, reliable and offers the best prices, SMJ Teratai is the choice for you. One of the largest money-transfer and exchange service providers in Malaysia with over 80 outlets nationwide, we also offerinternational remittance service to more than 100 countries worldwide at competitive exchange rates and a low transfer fees. At SMJ, is that easy

name: Souper Tang
desc: Feel tired and drained from the demands of modern, contemporary lifestyle? Head on over to Souper Tang for a balanced, healthy and great tasting herbal-based meal that will heal, restore and rebalance your body. With a full range menu offering rice dishes, noodles, meats, desserts and of course soups, you are really spoilt for choice. So bring back instant vitality with a bowl now!

name: SUBWAY®
desc: Best-known for their foot long and 6-inch sandwiches, Subway freshly baked their bread to prepare you the tastiest sandwiches, filled with only the best ingredients. Hand-picked your choice of meat, vegetables, toppings with a little add-ons of cheese and well-made sauces. Other than sandwiches, Subway offers scrumptious delicacies such as wraps, delis, fresh salads, crispy potato chips and yummy daily baked cookies! Make sure to add on thirst-quenching drinks when you purchase Subway combo.

name: Tao Yuan
desc: Tao Yuan is your one stop shop for all things local. Need a thoughtful gift? A trip back in time? Just head here and pick up some traditional tidbits, snacks and food products from Tao Yuan’s well-stocked shelves!

name: Tealive
desc: Tealive is known among Malaysians as the go-to place for flavoured bubble tea. With a refreshing menu of over 60 beverage choices, you can enjoy everything from signature milk teas and coffees to smoothies and matcha. Each drink is brewed with the best ingredients and served by the friendliest staff for the ultimate tea sipping experience. Tealive is all about promoting modern tea culture, hence the passion for quality products and service. Not a fan of tea? Order one at Tealive and get ready to change your mind!

name: Texas Chicken
desc: For full, Southern-styled fare, look no further than Texas Chicken! The Texas-born restaurant has been serving flavourful fried chicken since 1952. That’s not all they specialise in; find menu items such as crispy tender strips, burgers, wraps, side dishes and not to be missed, honey-butter biscuits baked from scratch!

name: ThaiExpress
desc: Home of Thai delicacies, the heat is always turned on at ThaiExpress! Food lovers flock to this restaurant for the dishes packed with a medley of spices and served with a modern twist. Thai favourites not to be missed include savoury Pad Thai, tangy Seafood Tom Yum soup and fragrant Pad Kaprao Gai. Feel free to dine in a large crowd or enjoy a satisfying meal for one, as ThaiExpress offers portions for sharing or individual dining. Ready for a feast full of flavour? Grab a table and get ready to order!

name: The Chicken Rice Shop
desc: The Chicken Rice Shop has been serving traditional Hainanese chicken rice for years, and is now a favourite staple to many. You won’t just get a perfect plate of fluffy rice and flavourful chicken- the brand stays true to their motto of ‘Chicken Rice...and More’ by offering a yummy menu of steamed, roasted, honey barbecued and soy sauce chicken, as well as more than 25 other dishes such as Hainanese Curry Chicken, Special Penang Chai Boay (Spicy Mixed Vegetables) and Penang Rojak. Every dish is lovingly prepared and made fresh in-house for maximum flavour and enjoyment.

name: The Founders Bakery
desc: One word – bagels. But not just any bagel! The bagels at The FOUNDERS BAKERY are brought to you exclusively by The FOUNDERS Cafe, a spot frequented by world-famous superstars Jay Chou, Hujan Noh Salleh, and many others, just to name a few! At The FOUNDERS BAKERY, it’s all about that #GOOD bagel life. Come on over to taste some deliciously good bagels!

name: TheFaceShop
desc: Science meets nature in this delightful beauty and skincare shop, with great products to pamper your skin, as well as lotions and potions for your hair and body, too.

name: Udders
desc: Udders is a gutsy ice cream shop serving mad tasty ice cream with a big scoop of fun! With a wacky love for ice cream and heaps of bizzaro humour, this cheeky ice cream brand is all about creating mouthwatering flavours anyone can enjoy. Take a bite of their Mao Shan Wang ice cream approved by durian lovers everywhere, or try one of their liqueur ice creams for something bold! Don’t forget to pack home a pint of good old Cookies & Cream to share with everyone you love.

name: VANZO
desc: Many of us enjoy a scent-sational ride, but it’s important to find the right air freshener for you. VANZO has teamed up with leading Japanese fragrance companies to formulate air fresheners that not only smell great, but are free from harmful chemicals, too! With VANZO’s range of air-fresheners, you can enjoy long-lasting floral, vanilla, or velvety musk scents in your vehicle. Take a look at their range of accessories as each product is carefully made to suit your individual needs. There’s bound to be something here for you!

name: VERRONA HILLS
desc: Verrona Hills delights with artisanal bread, pastries, and cakes, made from premium French-imported ingredients. Indulge in their freshly baked daily creations for a truly enchanting pâtisserie experience.

name: Village Grocer
desc: Everyone favourite neighbourhood supermarket is here! Village Grocer takes pride in providing fresh produce everyday at their stores. Asides from that, they also offer fine quality goods across a range of departments, as well as an enjoyable shopping experience for all.

name: Watsons
desc: “Look good, feel great” in the world of Watson. With thousands of stores around Asia and Europe, the world of Watson has expanded to become Asia’s leading health and beauty retailer AND the No. 1 pharmacy brand in Asia. Find anything from skincare, cosmetics, beauty and healthcare products to pharmaceutical drugs right here, with personalized advice and counseling in health, beauty and personal care tailored to your very needs.

name: Whoosh Eyewear
desc: Whoosh Eyewear embodies quick and fashionable eyewear for trendsetters who value speedy style and quality. The relaxed, open atmosphere welcomes you to browse ranges in 3 distinctive styles. Once you’ve selected your frames, you can choose from 4 fixed affordable price packages, have your eyesight tested by professional opticians, and your new glasses are ready! Looking good has never been so effortless, so get yours today!

name: ZUS Coffee
desc: Get your daily caffeine fix right here at ZUS Coffee! Using quality Arabica beans and top-notch brewing technology, ZUS Coffee delivers some of the best hand-crafted specialty coffee at a great price. Explore their unique signature menu (which includes the mysterious ZUS Gula Melaka and Zirty Latté) or get a good old cup of espresso all at the same place.

name: 小管家 Fix It All (South)
desc: Fix It All is a multi-talent service provider aimed to simplify your life. Services offered here include property management, fit-out consultancy, property, alteration, courier and printing services. They are constantly expanding their repertoire, so expect shoe & bag services to be added very soon! The brand’s aim to be accessible to all truly makes them everyone’s house keeper––some might say life-saver, too!
